definition_en: The name of the Latin script letter A/a.
example: I want a cup of coffee. / 私は一杯のコーヒーが欲しい。

definition_en: Easy to use.
example: I'm able to speak French fluently. / 私はフランス語を流暢に話すことができます。

definition_en: Moving around; astir.
example: What's the movie about? / その映画は何についての物語ですか？

definition_en: Heaven.
example: The bird flew above the tree. / 鳥は木の上を飛びました。

definition_en: Something done, a deed.
example: She decided to act on her plans and quit her job. / 彼女は、彼女の計画に実行することに決して、仕事を辞めた。

definition_en: Something done so as to accomplish a purpose.
example: I'm going to take action on this project. / 私はこのプロジェクトに取り組む。

definition_en: The state or quality of being active; activeness.
example: The company offers various activities to its employees, including sports and volunteer work. / その会社は従業員に対して様々なやり取りを提供しています包括スポーツとボランティア。

definition_en: An act or instance of adding.
meanings_ja: 加算する (mathematics), 追加する (to append or supplement)
example: I will add this book to my collection. / 私はこの本を私のコレクションに合わせます。

definition_en: (usually used predicatively, not attributively, be afraid) Impressed with fear or apprehension; in fear.
example: I'm afraid of spiders. / わたしはタランチュに怖がれる。

definition_en: Later; second (of two); next, following, subsequent
example: I'll see you after lunch. / ランチの後には会いましょう。

definition_en: Another time; once more.
meanings_ja: 再び (複数の意味がある場合は、主要な意味を2-3個まで列挙)
example: I'll try again. / 私はもう一度やってみます。

definition_en: Gone; gone by; gone away; passed; passed away.
example: I haven't seen my friends in 5 years ago. / 私は5年あまり友達を見ていない。

definition_en: To harmonize in opinion, statement, or action; to be in unison or concord; to be or become united or consistent; to concur.
meanings_ja: 支持する (in a general sense)
example: We agree to meet at 5pm. / 我々は17時に出会うことに同意する。

definition_en: A powered heavier-than-air aircraft with fixed wings.
example: The airplane took off from Tokyo and landed in New York. / 東京から新宿に飛び立って、新ヨークに着陸した。

definition_en: (with a possessive pronoun) Everything that one is capable of.
example: I want to eat all the pizza. / 私は全てのピザを食べたい。

definition_en: By oneself, solitary.
example: I feel alone on my birthday. / バースデイの日にひとりで感じる。

definition_en: In company; together.
example: I walked along the beach. /私は浜辺を歩きました。

definition_en: Prior to some specified time, either past, present, or future; by this time; previously.
meanings_ja: またまた (rarely used, implies that something has been done previously and again in the present)
example: I've already finished my homework. / 私の宿題は既にできてる

definition_en: (focus) In addition; besides; as well; further; too.
example: I like reading books, and she also likes it. / 私は読書を好みますし、あの女も同じく好きです。

definition_en: At all times; throughout all time; since the beginning.
example: I will always be there for you. / 君がいてくれることを常に信じてる。

definition_en: Before noon.
example: I am a teacher. / 私は教師です。

meanings_ja: 北米連合国 (USAを指す場合も)
example: The USA is a major player in global politics. / アメリカは世界政治の主要な勢力です。

meanings_ja: アメリカ文化、生活様式
example: The American is known for his hospitality. / 米国人はそのospitalityで有名です。

definition_en: One
example: I found an interesting book. / 私は楽しい本を見つけた。

definition_en: In rhythm, the second half of a divided beat.
meanings_ja: もしくは, どちらの場合も
example: I like reading books and watching movies. / 私は本を読むことが好きで、映画も観ることが好きです。

definition_en: An additional one of the same kind.
example: I'm going to the store. Another person is already there. / 私は店にいく。別の人もうそこにいる。

definition_en: A response or reply; something said or done in reaction to a statement or question.
example: What's your answer to the question? / その質問の回答は何ですか？

definition_en: To even the slightest extent, at all.
example: Do you have any money? / あなたは何束ねもない $?

definition_en: Any one out of an indefinite number of persons; anyone; any person.
example: Is anybody home? / domicileにいる人はいないの?

definition_en: Any person; anybody.
example: You can ask anyone for help. / 何者かについて尋ねることができます。

definition_en: Someone or something of importance.
meanings_ja: 何物も、どんなものも (in a broader sense)
example: I'll take anything you give me. / 私はあなたがくれた何でも受けます。

definition_en: A common, round fruit produced by the tree Malus domestica, cultivated in temperate climates.
example: The apple fell from the tree. / ringou wa ki kara ochite kita.

definition_en: An accepted (but deprecated and rarely used) SI unit of area equal to 100 square metres, or a former unit of approximately the same extent. Symbol: a.
example: Cats are mammals. / 猫たちは哺乳類である。

definition_en: The portion of the upper human appendage, from the shoulder to the wrist and sometimes including the hand.
example: The company has decided to cut its arms division. / 会社は自分の軍隊部門を閉鎖した。

definition_en: (with the verb "to be") Present in the vicinity.
example: I'll meet you around 5 pm tomorrow. / 明日 17時前には会いましょう。

definition_en: The conscious production or arrangement of sounds, colours, forms, movements, or other elements in a manner that affects the senses and emotions, usually specifically the production of the beautiful in a graphic or plastic medium.
example: The art of photography is a delicate balance between skill and creativity. / 写真の美術は技術と創造性の巧妙なバランスです。

definition_en: A piece of nonfictional writing such as a story, report, opinion piece, or entry in a newspaper, magazine, journal, dictionary, encyclopedia, etc.
meanings_ja: 学術論文, 新聞記事
example: The article was about the importance of recycling. / リサイクルの重要性についての記事であった。

definition_en: To such an extent or degree; to the same extent or degree.
meanings_ja: 同じように、また同様に
example: I like to read books as a hobby. / 私は趣味で読書を好みます。

definition_en: An act or instance of asking.
example: Can you ask John to help me? / ジョンの助けを頼むには、ジョンに申し立ててください。

definition_en: To reply to or talk to someone, either online or face-to-face. (from the practice of targeting a message or reply to someone online by writing @name)
meanings_ja: 時点において, また (指定された時間)

definition_en: Mental focus.
example: She needs attention from her teachers. / 彼女には教師らの注意が必要です。

definition_en: The originator or creator of a work, especially of a literary composition.
meanings_ja: 作家 (mainly referring to literary authors)
example: The author of the famous novel won a prize. / 有名小説の作者が賞を受賞した。

definition_en: To depart; to go to another place.
example: I'm going away for a vacation. / 私は休暇に出かけます。

definition_en: A very young human, particularly from birth to a couple of years old or until walking is fully mastered.
example: I'm going to buy a baby gift for my friend's new baby. / 私は友達の新しい赤ちゃんに買い物するつもりです。

definition_en: The rear of the body, especially the part between the neck and the end of the spine and opposite the chest and belly.
example: I need your back on this project. / このプロジェクトにはあなたのバックが必要です。

definition_en: Error, mistake.
example: The weather was bad today. / 今日は天気が悪かった。

definition_en: A flexible container made of cloth, paper, plastic, etc.
example: I need to carry my laptop in a bag. / パソコンをたすきに運ぶ必要があります。

definition_en: An inflatable buoyant object, often (but not necessarily) round and flexible.
meanings_ja: 弾丸（スポーツや催事での使われ方）
example: The balloon floated gently in the air. / 飛行物は穏かに空中に浮遊した。

definition_en: A strip of material used for strengthening or coupling.
meanings_ja: バンド（ sports equipment）,帯（strip of fabric）
example: The rock band is performing tonight. / ロック・バンドが今夜演奏します。

definition_en: An institution where one can place and borrow money and take care of financial affairs.
example: I went to the bank to deposit my paycheck. / 私は給与を預けるために銀行にいった。

definition_en: A lightweight container, generally round, open at the top, and tapering toward the bottom.
meanings_ja: つかみ物 (for a container-like basket)
example: I need to carry some items, so I'll use this basket. / これをぶきに持って行く必要があるため、这个を使用します。
I will be there tomorrow. / 私は明日そこにいる。

definition_en: A large omnivorous mammal, related to the dog and raccoon, having shaggy hair, a very small tail, and flat feet; a member of family Ursidae.
meanings_ja: ursosaeru（ bears to carry or endure）
example: The hiker had to bear the heavy backpack. / हイカーは重い背負りをurosae(te)する必要がありました。

definition_en: Someone who is beautiful. Can be used as a term of address.
example: She is a beautiful person. / 彼女はきれいな人です。

definition_en: To arrive, come (to a place).
example: She became a successful businesswoman. / 彼女は有名なビジネスウーマンになった。

definition_en: For the reason (that).
example: I'm tired because I didn't sleep well. / 私は眠れなかったため疲れた。

definition_en: To arrive, come (to a place).
example: I will become a teacher next year. / 私は来年教師になる。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: I have been studying English for three years. / 私は三年間英語を学んでいます。

definition_en: At an earlier time.
example: I'll see you before we leave. / 私たちは出発する前に君と会う。

definition_en: The act of doing that which begins anything; commencement of an action, state, or space of time; entrance into being or upon a course; the first act, effort, or state of a succession of acts or states.
example: The beginning of a new chapter in my life was exciting. / 新しい命の章のはじまりはとてもドキドキした。

definition_en: The rear, back-end
example: The children were playing behind the house. / 子供たちは家の後ろで遊んでいた。

definition_en: To accept as true, particularly without absolute certainty (i.e., as opposed to knowing)
example: I believe in you. / 君を信じています。

definition_en: The supreme effort one can make, or has made.
meanings_ja: 最高の (Saikō no) - For more formal situations or when emphasizing the utmost level of excellence.
example: The best way to get there is by car. / 車で行くのが一番です。

definition_en: An entity, usually animate, deemed superior to another; one who has a claim to precedence; a superior.
example: The new policy is better than the old one. / 新しい政策は旧の政策よりよい。

definition_en: A kind of needle, shorter than a sharp, with a small rounded eye, used for making fine stitches on heavy fabrics.
meanings_ja: 二つの間に、境目に位置している
example: The company is struggling between two different business models. / コンパニーは、二つのビジネスモデルの中で苦闘しています。

definition_en: Someone or something that is large in stature
meanings_ja: 巨大、膨大 (for larger-than-life or enormous sizes)
example: The big red car drove down the street. / 赤色の大きい車が通り道を走った。

definition_en: Of great size, large.
example: The bigger the house, the more expensive it is. / 家が大きい程高い。

definition_en: Of great size, large.
example: The biggest dog in the park was a golden retriever. / パークで一番大きい狗はゴールデン・レトリバーだった。

definition_en: Any of various bladed or pointed hand weapons, originally designating an Anglo-Saxon sword, and later a weapon of infantry, especially in the 14th and 15th centuries, commonly consisting of a broad, heavy, double-edged, hook-shaped blade, with a short pike at the back and another at the top, attached to the end of a long staff.
example: I received a bill from my electricity company. / 電気会社から領収書を受けました。

definition_en: A piece of metal placed in a horse's mouth and connected to the reins to direct the animal.
example: I got a bit tired after running. / 私は走った後少し疲れた。

definition_en: The colour/color perceived in the absence of light, but also when no light is reflected, but rather absorbed.
meanings_ja: 対立的, 悪意のある (in a figurative sense)
example: The black cat ran quickly across the road. / 黒い猫は道路を走った。

definition_en: An exclamation used to startle or frighten.
example: The bo of the drum filled the room. / ドラムの音が部屋を満たした。

definition_en: A relatively long, wide and thin piece of any material, usually wood or similar, often for use in construction or furniture-making.
example: The company decided to launch a new board of directors. / 会社は新しい取締役会を発足させることに決断した。

definition_en: A collection of sheets of paper bound together to hinge at one edge, containing printed or written material, pictures, etc.
meanings_ja: 記録 (as in a record book)
会議の書類 (as in a meeting book)
example: I'm reading a book about history. / 私は歴史に関する書籍を読んでいます。

definition_en: To inspire boredom in somebody.
example: The movie was so boring that I fell asleep. / 映画はとても退屈して眠ってしまった。

definition_en: Deviation of the path of a rolling ball from a straight line; slope; slant.
meanings_ja: 貸し受ける (to take something on loan)
example: I'm going to borrow a book from my friend. / 私は友達から書籍を貸し借りに行く。

definition_en: Each of the two, or of the two kinds.
example: I like both coffee and tea. / コーヒーとお茶、両方好きです。

definition_en: The lowest part of anything.
example: The bottom of the ocean is still unexplored. / 海の底はまだ未探検です。

definition_en: To obtain (something) in exchange for money or goods
example: I bought a new phone. / 私は新しい携帯電話を買いました。

definition_en: The control center of the central nervous system of an animal located in the skull which is responsible for perception, cognition, attention, memory, emotion, and action.
meanings_ja: brain - (, ninshin) (referring to the physical organ)
brain - (, chokkan) (referring to intellect or intelligence)
example: My brain is always racing with new ideas. / 私の頭は常に新しいアイデアと反応する。

definition_en: An instance of breaking something into two or more pieces.
example: I need to break this vase. / 私にはこの花瓶を壊さなければいけない。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To transport toward somebody/somewhere.
example: I will bring a book to school tomorrow. / 学校に行く日曜に本を持って行く。

definition_en: Son of the same parents as another person.
example: My brothers and I love playing soccer. / 私の兄弟たちと私たちはサッカーを愛して遊ぶ。

definition_en: (ditransitive) To transport toward somebody/somewhere.
meanings_ja: 連れてきた (to bring someone/something to a place)
example: She brought her favorite book to the party. / 彼女はパーティーに自分の好きな本を連れてきた。

definition_en: The physique of a human body; constitution or structure of a human body.
example: I want to build a new house. / 新しい家を建てることをしたい。

definition_en: The act or process by which something is built; construction.
meanings_ja: constructive effort, building relationship (複数の意味がある場合は、主要な意味を挙げました)
example: I'm going to the new building on campus. / 学校キャンパスにある新しい建物に行く。

definition_en: A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
example: I'm in business to make a profit. / 私は利益を目指して事業を始めました。

definition_en: An instance or example of using the word "but".
example: I want to go out, but it's raining. / 私は出かけることをしたいけれど、雨が降りてる。

definition_en: Something which is bought; a purchase.
meanings_ja: その物を所有する (rare) - this translation is less common and implies owning or possessing the item
example: I want to buy a new phone. / 私は新しいスマートフォンを買いたい。

definition_en: A flying insect, of the clade Anthophila within the hymenopteran superfamily Apoidea, known for its organised societies (though only a minority have them), for collecting pollen and (in some species) producing wax and honey.
example: I wrote the letter by myself. / 私は自分で手紙を書きました。

definition_en: Any system by which time is divided into days, weeks, months, and years.
meanings_ja: スケジュール (calendar as a schedule or planner)
example: What's the date of your birthday on the calendar? / なに日が誕生日のカレンダーにありますか？

definition_en: A telephone conversation.
meanings_ja: 呼びつける, 招集する
example: I need to call my friend to confirm the plans. / 私は友達と計画を確認するために電話します。

definition_en: (heading) To use one's voice.
example: She was called Sarah. / 彼女はサラと呼ばれました。

definition_en: Used to indicate that the following event, period, or change in state occurred in the past, after a time of waiting, enduring, or anticipation
example: He came to the party at 8pm. / 彼は18時からパーティーに来た。

definition_en: A device for taking still or moving pictures or photographs.
example: I took a picture with my camera. / 私はカメラで写真を撮った。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
example: I can speak English fluently. / 私は日本語を流暢に話すことができます。

definition_en: Something that cannot be done.
meanings_ja: 将来の出来事を否定する (to deny a future event)
example: I cannot attend the meeting tomorrow. /私は明日会議には出席できません。

definition_en: A wheeled vehicle that moves independently, with at least three wheels, powered mechanically, steered by a driver and mostly for personal transportation.
example: I'm going to ride my car to work. / 私は自転車で仕事に行く。

definition_en: A playing card.
example: I got a new job card today. / 私は今日、新しい人事カードを受けました。

definition_en: A playing card.
example: I'm collecting cards for a new deck. / ギャンジュゲームのためのカードを集めている。

definition_en: Grief, sorrow.
example: I'll take care of this task. /私はこのタスクを注意しておきます。

definition_en: A manner of transporting or lifting something; the grip or position in which something is carried.
example: I will carry my backpack to school. / 私は学校に行くためにバックパックを携帯します。

definition_en: An actual event, situation, or fact.
meanings_ja: 事例 (jigyo) - referring to a specific example or instance
ケース (kēsu) - used in law, medicine, and other fields to refer to a particular situation or scenario
example: In this case, we need to consider the patient's medical history. / このケースでは、患者の医療歴を考慮する必要があります。

definition_en: An animal of the family Felidae:
example: The cats are sleeping. / ネコたちは寝ています。

definition_en: A single-room dwelling for a hermit.
example: The cell in my body is responsible for producing insulin. / 私の体内にあり、インスリンを生産する小胞体がある。

definition_en: An item of furniture used to sit on or in, comprising a seat, legs, back, and sometimes arm rests, for use by one person. Compare stool, couch, sofa, settee, loveseat and bench.
example: I sat in the chair. / 私は座布に座った。

definition_en: An item of furniture used to sit on or in, comprising a seat, legs, back, and sometimes arm rests, for use by one person. Compare stool, couch, sofa, settee, loveseat and bench.
meanings_ja: 会議席、座椅子 (in a formal setting or in reference to specific types of chairs)
example: I bought some new chairs for my living room. / 私は、新しい椅子を部屋に購入しました。

definition_en: The process of becoming different.
example: I need to change my flight. / 私はフライトを変更する必要があります。

definition_en: A situation in which the king is directly threatened by an opposing piece.
meanings_ja: 支払い (bank check) / 承認 (to check something)
example: I need to check my email. / メールを確認したい。

definition_en: A board game for two players with each beginning with sixteen chess pieces moving according to fixed rules across a chessboard with the objective to checkmate the opposing king.
meanings_ja: スタイルの戦略ゲーム
将棋（将棋盤上での競技）
example: The game of chess is a great way to improve your strategic thinking. / チェスは戦略的な思考を向上させる大きな遊びです。

definition_en: The plant Smilax china, a liana of much of eastern Asia.
meanings_ja: (porcelain) - This refers to a type of ceramic material or a product made from it.
(cup and saucer set) - This is a specific type of tableware set that originated in China.
example: I'm going to China this summer. / 私は今年夏に中国に行く。

meanings_ja: 中国人（じょうとくじん）のことを指す
中華料理や文化を指す
example: The Chinese New Year is celebrated with parades and fireworks. / 中国新年はパレードや打ち上げ花火で祝う。

definition_en: An option; a decision; an opportunity to choose or select something.
example: Do you have a choice between these two restaurants? / これらのレストランの間で選択があるのか？

definition_en: To pick; to make the choice of; to select.
example: I want to choose a new phone. / 私は新しい電話を選びたい。

definition_en: Removal of dirt.
example: The hotel room was clean. / ホテルの部屋は汚れのない。

definition_en: Full extent; distance between extreme limits; especially; the distance between the nearest surfaces of two bodies, or the space between walls.
meanings_ja: 明白な, 晴れている (additional meanings include transparent, lucid, and straightforward)
example: The instructions were clear and easy to follow. / 手順書は簡単で読みやすかった。

definition_en: An end or conclusion.
example: I'm going to close this deal soon. / その取引をまもってすぐにしたい。

definition_en: A rock; boulder; a hill.
example: The cloud covered the sun. / 太陽を雲が覆った。

definition_en: (of a thing) Having a low temperature.
example: It's cold outside. / 外は寒い。

definition_en: A corporate group; a group of colleagues.
example: I'm planning to attend college in the US next year. / アメリカの大学に留学する計画です。

definition_en: The spectral composition of visible light
example: The color of the dress is blue. / ドレスの文字の色は青い。

definition_en: Coming, arrival; approach.
meanings_ja: 出会う (to meet someone), 到着する (to arrive)
example: I will come to see you tomorrow. / 明日、私はあなたを訪ねる。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
example: The new policy comes into effect next month. / 来月、新しい政策が発効します。

definition_en: To move from further away to nearer to.
example: The new employee is coming on Monday. / 新しい社員が月曜日に到着します。

definition_en: Mutual good, shared by more than one.
example: The common language of business is English. / ビジネスの共通言語は英語です。

definition_en: A team; a group of people who work together professionally.
example: The company will send a team to the meeting. / その会社は、会議にチームを派遣します。

definition_en: A person employed to perform computations; one who computes.
meanings_ja: パーソナルコンピューター (in the sense of a personal computer)
example: I need to upgrade my computer. / 私のコンピューターをアップグレードしたいです。

definition_en: Agreement in a design or plan; union formed by mutual communication of opinions and views; accordance in a scheme; harmony; simultaneous action.
meanings_ja: 合図、協調 (in a broader sense)
example: The rock band is going to perform at the concert tonight. / 今夜のコンサートでロックバンドが演奏します。

definition_en: A moderate or refreshing state of cold; moderate temperature of the air between hot and cold; coolness.
meanings_ja: かしこい (Note: This meaning is less common in modern Japanese)
example: The cool breeze felt great on a hot summer day. / 夏の暑い日にさわやかな風が気持ち良かった。

definition_en: (auxiliary verb, defective) To know how to; to be able to.
example: I could run a marathon if I trained harder. / 私は、よりトレーニングしたらマラソンを走れる。

definition_en: (chiefly British) An area of land; a district, region.
example: The country I love is Japan. / 私が愛する国は日本です。

definition_en: A sequence of events.
meanings_ja: 路線、コース (in a broader sense)
example: I'm taking a course in marketing. / 私はマーケティングの学習をしている。

definition_en: To bring into existence; (sometimes in particular:)
meanings_ja: 生み出す (when referring to bringing something new into existence)
example: The company created a new product line. / その会社は新しい製品ラインを作った。

definition_en: The act of cutting.
meanings_ja: 切り離す, 分けちまう
example: I need to cut this rope. / よろこの绳を切らなければいけない。

definition_en: Abbreviation of declare.

definition_en: A time period of sixty minutes; one twenty-fourth of a day.
example: I have to work for hours today. / 今日は時間がかかる。

definition_en: A structure built or serving as an abode of human beings.
example: I'm going home to my house. / 私は、自分の人家に帰る。

definition_en: The means by which something is accomplished.
example: How do you like your coffee? / コーヒーはどのよう好きですか？

definition_en: A hundred-dollar bill, or any other note denominated 100 (e.g. a hundred euros).
example: I have a hundred friends. / 私は百人の友達がいます。

definition_en: The name of the Latin-script letter I.
example: I am going to the store. / 私は店に行きます。

definition_en: An abstract archetype of a given thing, compared to which real-life examples are seen as imperfect approximations; pure essence, as opposed to actual examples.
example: "I had an idea to start a new business." / "私は、新しいビジネスを始めるという考えを持った。"

definition_en: An abstract archetype of a given thing, compared to which real-life examples are seen as imperfect approximations; pure essence, as opposed to actual examples.
example: The company had many ideas for new products. / その会社は新しい製品の多くの提案を持っていた。

definition_en: An uncertainty, possibility, condition, doubt etc.
example: If it rains, we will stay at home. / 雨が降るなら、我々は家で過ごす。

definition_en: A short fanfic or prompt placing a reader insert in a novel scenario with a character or celebrity.
example: I can imagine being on a tropical island. / 私は、熱帯島にいるイメージを持つ。

definition_en: Having relevant and crucial value.
example: The project was important because it affected many people. / そのプロジェクトは多くの人々に影響するため大切なものだった。

definition_en: A position of power or influence, or a way to get it.
meanings_ja: 到達している, 参加している (to be involved in)
example: I'm in love. / 私は恋に落ちている。

definition_en: The interior or inner part.
example: The package was inside the box. / その箱の中にパッケージがありました。

definition_en: To engage the attention of; to awaken interest in; to excite emotion or passion in, in behalf of a person or thing.
meanings_ja: その分野に親しむ (this meaning is often used in academic or professional contexts)
example: I'm interested in studying abroad. / 私は留学したいと思っています。

definition_en: To engage the attention of; to awaken interest in; to excite emotion or passion in, in behalf of a person or thing.
example: The documentary was interesting because it showed a unique perspective on the issue. / ドキュメンタリーは、その問題に対する独特の視点を示したため面白かった。

definition_en: Any set of computer networks that communicate using the Internet Protocol. (An intranet.)
meanings_ja: 世界中のネットワーク
example: The internet has changed the way we communicate. / インターネットは、我々がコミュニケーションする方法を変えてきた。

definition_en: To or towards the inside of.
meanings_ja: 吸収する, 変化する
example: The plane flew into the storm. / 飛行機は嵐に突入した。
He is a good teacher. / 彼はいい教師です。

meanings_ja: 仮定の過去完了 (used in conditional sentences)
example: She isn't here, so I'll wait. / 彼女はここにないので、私は待つ。

definition_en: One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.
meanings_ja: 何か (indicating something unknown or unspecified)
example: I saw it on TV. / テレビで見たそうです。

definition_en: One who is neither a he nor a she; a creature; a dehumanized being.
meanings_ja: 接続詞として用いることもある
example: This is its own reward. / これはその報酬です。

definition_en: A juvenile male turkey.
meanings_ja: 仲間 (naka-ma) - A close friend or acquaintance.
やり手 (yari-te) - A skilled or capable person.
example: He's a jake in martial arts. / 彼は武道のやり手です。

definition_en: A hard black enamel varnish containing asphalt.
example: I'm going to Japan. / 私は日本に行く。
The Japanese chef prepared a delicious meal. / 日系のシェフは美味しい料理を作った。

meanings_ja: サイモン・バシク・シーグル役の俳優 (note: this refers to Jason Schwartzman, an American actor)
example: The movie star Jason was a big hit. / ジャソンの映画スターは大ヒットした。

definition_en: A task.
example: I'm looking for a job. / 私は就業を探しています。

definition_en: A task.
example: I'm looking for a job that allows me to travel. / 私は旅行できる就職を探しています。

definition_en: A male; a guy; a fellow.
meanings_ja: アメリカンフットボールの選手
example: He's a regular joe. / 彼は 普通の男性です。

definition_en: A prostitute's client.
example: John is a great johnny on stage! / ジャンはステージで素晴らしい若い男です!

definition_en: A liquid from a plant, especially fruit.
example: I'm thirsty, can I have some orange juice? / オレンジのジュースをください

definition_en: The act of jumping; a leap; a spring; a bound.
meanings_ja: make a sudden decision or action
example: I'll jump at the chance to go to Hawaii! / ハワイに行くチャンスを掴む!

definition_en: Factually right, correct; factual.
example: The food was just right. / は正味良かった。

definition_en: The main tower of a castle or fortress, located within the castle walls.
meanings_ja: 維持する, 保持する (mainly referring to maintaining or preserving something)
example: I'll keep your secret. / 秘密はあなたに持つ。
My friend Kevin is a great guy. / 私の友達ケヴィンは最高です。

definition_en: An object designed to open and close a lock.
example: The password is the key to unlocking my computer. / パスワードは、コンピュータを解錠するための主要な要素です。

definition_en: A young goat.
example: The new employee was treated like a kid by his colleagues. / その新入社員は同僚たちから子供のように扱われていた。

definition_en: A type, race or category; a group of entities that have common characteristics such that they may be grouped together.
meanings_ja: 高潔な, 愛想の良い
example: She has a kind heart. / 彼女はやさしい心を持つ。

definition_en: A type, race or category; a group of entities that have common characteristics such that they may be grouped together.
example: The store sells many kinds of toys. / Various toys are available at the store.

definition_en: Knowledge; the state of knowing.
meanings_ja: 分かる、理解している (for understanding or comprehension)
example: I know how to ride a bike. / 私はバイクを乗りこなす方法を知っています。

definition_en: Knowledge; the state of knowing.
example: He knows the answer. / 彼は解答を知っている。
The country of Korea has a rich cultural heritage. / 韓国の国民文化は非常に豊かです。

definition_en: The part of Earth which is not covered by oceans or other bodies of water.
example: The team will land on the moon in 2025. / 2025年にチームは月に着陸します。

definition_en: A body of words, and set of methods of combining them (called a grammar), understood by a community and used as a form of communication.
meanings_ja: ヒューマン・コミュニケーションの媒体
example: English is my native language. / 英語は私たちのnative languageです。

definition_en: An old musical note, equal to two longas, four breves, or eight semibreves.
example: The hotel room was large and comfortable. / ホテルの部屋は大きく、快適でした。

definition_en: Final, ultimate, coming after all others of its kind.
example: The party will be my last tonight. / 今日は最後のパーティーです。

definition_en: A shift (scheduled work period) that takes place late in the day or at night.
example: I'm running late for my meeting. / 私は会議に出遅れます。

definition_en: Near the end of a period of time.
example: I'll see you later. / 私はのちに会います。

definition_en: The body of binding rules and regulations, customs and standards established in a community by its legislative and judicial authorities.
example: The new law requires all cars to have seatbelts. / 新しい律にはすべての自動車にシートベルトを持つことが必要です。

definition_en: A smaller amount or quantity.
meanings_ja: より少ない (quantitative sense), いっぺんの程度が低い (qualitative sense)
example: The company is trying to produce less waste. / 会社は、ゴミを少なくして作業中。

definition_en: The allowing of possession of a property etc. in exchange for rent.
example: Let me try. / 私が試してみます。

definition_en: A symbol in an alphabet.
meanings_ja: 文字 (in mathematics or computer science)
example: I wrote a letter to my friend yesterday. / 私は昨日友人に手紙を書きました。

definition_en: (usually in the plural) Something that a person likes (prefers).
example: I like reading books. / 私は本を読むのを気に入り。

definition_en: A path through two or more points (compare ‘segment’); a continuous mark, including as made by a pen; any path, curved or straight.
meanings_ja: ライン ( transportation, phone number, etc.)
example: The company's new product is on line. / その会社の新製品は発売ラインです。

definition_en: A strip of fabric, especially from the edge of a piece of cloth.
example: I made a list of things to buy at the store. / ストアで買うもののリストを作った。

definition_en: An instance of listening.
meanings_ja: 君主に耳を傾ける (to listen to someone in a position of authority)
example: Can you listen to my advice? / 君のアドバイスを聞いて欲しい。

definition_en: To pay attention to a sound or speech.
example: Are you listening? / きみは聞いていんの？

definition_en: A small amount.
meanings_ja: 若い (referring to young age or youthfulness)
example: The little puppy is very cute. / この小さい柴犬はとても可愛しい。

definition_en: To be alive; to have life.
meanings_ja: 生きている状態にある
example: I love to live in the city. / 私は都市生活が大好きです。

definition_en: To be alive; to have life.
example: The new apartment is my living space. / 新しいアパートは私の実際の住所です。

definition_en: A long vowel.
example: The road is long. / 道は長い。
I will look at the map. / マップを見ます。

meanings_ja: 確認した (in a context where it means "checked" or "verified")
example: She looked up the recipe online / 彼女はオンラインでレシピを確認した。

definition_en: The act of one who looks; a glance.
meanings_ja: 検索する (in a digital sense)
example: I'm looking for a new job. / 新しい仕事を探しています。

definition_en: One's appearance or attractiveness.
meanings_ja: 見えるようにする、見せかける
example: She looked confident in her new clothes. / 彼女は新しい服を着て自信を持ったようだった。

definition_en: To cause (something) to cease to be in one's possession or capability due to unfortunate or unknown circumstances, events or reasons.
example: I'm going to lose my phone if I don't find it. / 私の電話を失うよもし見つからない。

definition_en: To cause (something) to cease to be in one's possession or capability due to unfortunate or unknown circumstances, events or reasons.
example: I was lost in the woods, but then I found my way back. / 私は森に迷っていて、しかし、私の道を発見して戻りました。

definition_en: A large quantity or number; a great deal.
meanings_ja: また、場所の意味で「場所」、「土地」
example: I bought a lot of books yesterday. / 私は昨日たくさんの本を買いました。

definition_en: A large quantity or number; a great deal.
example: I've got lots of books to read. / 私には多くの本があります。

definition_en: Strong affection.
example: I love you. / 僕はあなたを愛しています。

definition_en: (of people) Favoured by luck; fortunate; having good success or good fortune
example: I felt very lucky when I won the lottery! / ロトリー賞を当たった時、非常に運気のよかった!

definition_en: Abbreviation of million.
meanings_ja: ミリリットル (milliliter) - a unit of volume
メーター (meter) - a unit of length or distance
example: I need 500ml of water for my plants. / 私の植物に500ミリリットルの水が必要です。

definition_en: A grub or maggot.
example: The company made a new product yesterday. / 会社は昨日新しい商品を作り上げた。

definition_en: Brand or kind; model.
meanings_ja: 成立させる (to create or establish something)
example: I will make a cake for my birthday. / 私は誕生日のプレゼントとしてケーキを作る。

definition_en: Brand or kind; model.
example: She makes a lot of mistakes. / 彼女は多くの間違いをする。

definition_en: An adult male human.
example: The man walked down the street. / 男が通りを歩いた。

definition_en: A multitude; a great aggregate; a mass of people; the generality; the common herd.
meanings_ja: 多くの (when referring to a large quantity or number)
何人かに満ちている (when describing a situation with many people)
example: I have many friends. / 私は友達が多くいます。

definition_en: A gathering of people for the purchase and sale of merchandise at a set time, often periodic.
example: The company will launch a new product in the market. / その会社は新製品を市場で発売します。

definition_en: To be strong; to have power (over).
meanings_ja: 可能である (possibility), 希望している (wish)
example: It may rain tomorrow. / 明日は雨が降るかもしれない。

definition_en: Something that is possibly true.
example: I'll go to the movie maybe tonight. / 今夜映画に行くかもしれません。

definition_en: As the direct object of a verb.
example: What do you want me to do? / 私は何をしますか？

definition_en: To lament.
meanings_ja: いい加減な (informal), 悪意のある (malevolent)
example: She's mean to her little brother. / 彼女は弟に苛立ちしている。

definition_en: (of words or symbols) The entity, perception, feeling or concept thereby represented or evoked.
meanings_ja: 解釈、内容 (in a broader sense)
example: What's the meaning of life? / 人生の意味は何ですか?

definition_en: To lament.
example: The new policy means we have to work longer hours. / 新しい政策は、私たちは更に長い時間働く必要があります。

definition_en: One who officially belongs to a group.
example: The club has many members who love playing soccer. / サッカー好きのメンバーがクラブに多くいる。

definition_en: A communication, or what is communicated; any concept or information conveyed.
example: I'll send you a message when I arrive. / 私は到着時にお知らせします。

definition_en: To make contact (with) while in proximity.
meanings_ja: 対面した (in a formal or official context)
example: I met her at the party yesterday. / 私は昨日パーティーで彼女と会った。

definition_en: A syllable used in sol-fa (solfège) to represent the third note of a major scale.
example: The spacecraft is heading towards mi. / スペースシャトルは地点に向かっています。

definition_en: The ability for rational thought.
example: I must use my mind to solve this problem. / これを解決するには、自分の考えることが必要です。

definition_en: My; belonging to me; that which belongs to me.
meanings_ja: 探鉱の鉱区、軍隊の基地
example: The mine is not open to the public. / 私共には一般公開ではありません。

definition_en: A unit of time equal to sixty seconds (one-sixtieth of an hour).
meanings_ja: 概要、要約 (in a meeting or report)
example: Can you give me the minutes of the last meeting? / 最後の会議のメモをください。

definition_en: An error; a blunder.
example: I made a mistake on the exam. / テストで誤りをした。

definition_en: A person who serves as a subject for artwork or fashion, usually in the medium of photography but also for painting or drawing.
meanings_ja: 標準例 (in a technical or scientific context)
example: She's a model on the catwalk. / 她はストリートショーでモデルです。

definition_en: (familiar) mother.
example: My mom is a great cook. / 私の母は料理がうまいです。

definition_en: A brief, unspecified amount of time.
example: It was a moment of great excitement. / それは大きな興奮の瞬間であった。

definition_en: A legally or socially binding conceptual contract of entitlement to wealth, void of intrinsic value, payable for all debts and taxes, and regulated in supply.
example: I need money to buy a new phone. / 私は新しい電話を買うために財富が必要です。

definition_en: A period into which a year is divided, historically based on the phases of the moon.
example: The new employee's salary will increase in three months. / 三ヶ月後、新入社員の給与が増加します。

definition_en: A period into which a year is divided, historically based on the phases of the moon.
example: The project will take several months to complete. / そのプロジェクトは幾ヶ月かかる。

definition_en: The Earth's moon Luna; the sole natural satellite of the Earth, represented in astronomy and astrology by ☾.
example: The astronauts walked on the moon. / 宇宙飛行士たちは月に歩いた。

definition_en: To a greater degree or extent.
example: I want more coffee, please. / ください。

definition_en: The part of the day from dawn to noon.
example: It's a beautiful morning. / きれいな朝です。

definition_en: The greatest amount.
example: I'm most excited about the new iPhone. / 私は新しいiPhoneについて一番に興奮しています。

definition_en: The act of moving; a movement.
meanings_ja: 転換する, 移動する
example: I'm going to move to Tokyo. / 東京に転居します。

definition_en: Large, great.
example: I have much work to do today. / 私の今日の仕事は多い。

definition_en: A series of sounds organized in time, employing melody, harmony, tempo etc. usually to convey a mood.
meanings_ja: 音律, 歌謡 (for a more literal translation)
example: I love listening to music. / 私は音楽を愛聴しています。

definition_en: Something that is mandatory or required.
example: I must go to bed early tonight. / 私は今晩早く眠りたい。

definition_en: Used to express surprise, shock or amazement.
example: This is my car. / これは私たちの車です。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) Me, as direct or indirect object the speaker as the object of a verb or preposition, when the speaker is also the subject.
example: I'll go to the party myself. / 私自身、パーティーにいく。

definition_en: North
example: The number of students is 20. / 学生の数は20人です。

definition_en: Any nounal word or phrase which indicates a particular person, place, class, or thing.
example: What's your name? / あなたの名前は何ですか？

definition_en: The natural world; that which consists of all things unaffected by or predating human technology, production, and design. (Compare ecosystem.)
example: The beauty of nature is breathtaking. / 自然の美しさは息を呑む。

definition_en: The left side of a horse or of a team of horses pulling a carriage etc.
example: The hotel is near the beach. / ホテルはビーチ近くにある。

definition_en: A requirement for something; something needed.
example: I need a new phone. / 私は新しいスマートフォンが必要です。

definition_en: At no time; on no occasion; in no circumstance.
example: I'll never forget my childhood. / 私は子供時代を忘れません。

definition_en: Things that are new.
example: This is a new project. / このは新しいプロジェクトです。

definition_en: New information of interest.
example: The news shocked me. / 私をショックさせたニュース。

definition_en: The one that follows after this one.
meanings_ja: その後の状態、次のステップ
example: What's next? / なんだかんばい?

definition_en: The period between sunset and sunrise, when a location faces far away from the sun, thus when the sky is dark.
meanings_ja:
I'm happy to help! 😊

夜: [yoru]

* 主要な意味
夜間: [yoru-kan]
暗い時間帯を指す

例文: The sun set, and it's a lovely night. / 太陽下がり、夜は美しい。

Note: There are other possible translations for "night" depending on the context, but I've focused on the main meaning and an additional nuance. 😊
example: The sun set, and it's a lovely night. / 太陽下がり、夜は美しい。

definition_en: The digit or figure 9.
meanings_ja: 数えの九番目 (in a series or sequence)
example: I'm the ninth student in my class. / 私はクラスの9番目の生徒です。

definition_en: A negating expression; an answer that shows disagreement or disapproval
example: I don't like that movie. / 私はあの映画が好きじゃない。

definition_en: Someone who is not important or well-known.
example: I'm going to the party alone, nobody is coming with me. / 私はパーティーに行くが、誰も来ません。

definition_en: A person without religious affiliation.
example: I didn't bring my umbrella, so I got wet. / 傘を持ってこなかったので、濡れた。

definition_en: One of the four major compass points, specifically 0°, directed toward the North Pole, and conventionally upwards on a map, abbreviated as N.
meanings_ja: 北方地域 (地理的な意味)
example: The North Pole is very cold. / ノースポールは非常に寒い。

definition_en: A unary operation on logical values that changes true to false, and false to true.
example: I don't like that movie. / 僕はその映画が嫌いです。

definition_en: Something trifling, or of no consequence or importance.
example: I have nothing to do today. / 今日は何もしない

meanings_ja: 11月 (November is the 11th month of the year)
冬の始まり (the beginning of winter)
example: I'm looking forward to November, as it's a great time to go hiking. / 11月は、ヒッキングがしたい時期です。

definition_en: The present time.
example: I'm going to the store now. / 私は今すぐ店に行く。

definition_en: An abstract entity used to describe quantity.
meanings_ja: 順位 (in a competition or ranking)
example: The contest was won by number one. / 最優秀賞は一番に 수상しました。

meanings_ja: 露の季節 (Falling leaf season, in autumn)
example: The best time to visit Japan is in October. / 日本を訪ねるベストタイムは10月です。

definition_en: Expressing distance or motion.
(usually in phrases such as 'from the off', 'at the off', etc.) Beginning; starting point.
meanings_ja: 離れる, 遮る (as in "turn off the light" or "put off until later")
example: I'll turn off the TV when I leave. / テレビを出庫すると止める。

definition_en: A ceremonial duty or service, particularly:
example: The office is open from 9am to 5pm. / オフィスは午前9時から午後5時に営業しています。

definition_en: An utterance of oh; a spoken expression of surprise, acknowledgement, etc.
meanings_ja: an expression of surprise or excitement
example: "Oh no, I just spilled coffee all over my shirt!" / "あぁ、コーヒーがシャツに塗れた!"

definition_en: Endorsement; approval.
example: Are you going to the movie? Okay, I'll meet you there. / 映画に行くね？よし、そこで会おう。

definition_en: (with the, invariable plural only) People who are old; old beings; the older generation, taken as a group.
example: He's an old friend from college. / 彼は大学時代の古くなる友人です。

definition_en: To switch on
example: The lights were on. / 燈はオンでした。

definition_en: (frequency) One and only one time.
meanings_ja: かつて、過去に (in a past context)
example: I'll never forget the day I met her once. / 私は彼女と出会った日を忘れることはない。

definition_en: The digit or figure 1.
example: I need one pencil. / 私は一本のペンシルが必要です。

definition_en: The digit or figure 1.
example: The ones I like best are blue. / わたしの好きなのは青いです。

definition_en: An only child.
example: I'll only attend the meeting if you come with me. / 僕はあなたと一緒に行くならみかんに出席する。

definition_en: Not closed
meanings_ja: 明かす、明白になる (to reveal or become clear)
example: The new policy will open up new opportunities for us. / 新しい政策が私たちに新しい機会をもたらします。

definition_en: Connects at least two alternative words, phrases, clauses, sentences, etc. each of which could make a passage true. In English, this is the "inclusive or." The "exclusive or" is formed by "either [...] or".
example: Do you want to go to the movies or play soccer? / 映画に行くかサッカーをプレイするの？

definition_en: Arrangement, disposition, or sequence.
example: I placed an order for a new smartphone. / スマートフォンを新しいものに注文しました。

definition_en: An other, another (person, etc), more often rendered as another.
meanings_ja: 他の (in a comparative sense, e.g. "this is other than that")
example: I'm trying to get in touch with the other person who was at the meeting yesterday / 昨日の会議にいた他の人物と連絡を取りたい

definition_en: An other, another (person, etc), more often rendered as another.
meanings_ja: 多くの人々 (referring to a large group of people)
example: The team worked together, including others from different departments. / チームは、異なる部門の他の人たちと一緒に仕事をした。
This is our car. / これは私たちの自動車です。

definition_en: A means of exit, escape, reprieve, etc.
meanings_ja: 取り除く, 排除する (in some cases)
example: I'm going out to play. / 我は遊ぶために外に出ます。

definition_en: A set of six legal balls bowled.
example: The ball went over the fence. / ボールはフェンスの上に飛んだ。

definition_en: Belonging to; possessed; proper to. Often marks a possessive determiner as reflexive, referring back to the subject of the clause or sentence.
example: This is my own work. / これは私の自分作です。

definition_en: A substance that is applied as a liquid or paste, and dries into a solid coating that protects or adds color/colour to an object or surface to which it has been applied.
example: I'm going to paint my room red. / 私は部屋を赤く塗ります。

definition_en: A sheet material used for writing on or printing on (or as a non-waterproof container), usually made by draining cellulose fibres from a suspension in water.
meanings_ja: 紙媒体, 文書 (in addition to the main meaning of writing paper)
example: I need a piece of paper to take notes. / 私はノートを取るために紙が必要です。

definition_en: A portion; a component.
example: I took part in the meeting. /私は会議に参加した。

definition_en: A person or group of people constituting a particular side in a contract or legal action.
meanings_ja: パーティー（パーティ） - social gatherings
パーティション - divisions or factions (in a broader sense)
example: The company is hosting a party to celebrate its anniversary. / コーポレーションは、記念パーティーを組織しています。

definition_en: A person or group of people constituting a particular side in a contract or legal action.
example: The party system in Japan is complex. / 日本の党政治は複雑です。

definition_en: To change place.
example: The exam was passed with flying colors. / スクールの試験は飛び抜けて通過した。

definition_en: To change place.
meanings_ja: 過去の時間、以前にあった状態
example: I've been to many places in my past. / 私は過去に多くの場所に行った。

definition_en: Money given in return for work; salary or wages.
example: I need to pay my rent this month. / 今月の賃貸借金を支払う必要があります。

definition_en: A percentage, a proportion (especially per hundred).
meanings_ja: パーソナルコンピューター
パーソナルコンピューターシステム (a personal computer system)
example: I'm going to use my PC to work on this project. / 私はこのプロジェクトをパーソナルコンピューターで作業します。

definition_en: Used as plural of person; a body of human beings considered generally or collectively; a group of two or more persons.
meanings_ja: 群衆、民衆 (depending on the context)
example: The people of Japan are very friendly. / 日本の人は非常に優しくてあります。

definition_en: An individual; usually a human being.
example: The person I met yesterday was very friendly. / Yesterday, I met a very friendly human.

definition_en: A device for transmitting conversations and other sounds in real time across distances, now often a small portable unit also capable of running software etc.
meanings_ja: 音信器 (onsenki) - a device for making and receiving phone calls
手帳電話 (tebā denwa) - a mobile phone or cell phone
example: I'm going to make a call on my phone. / 私は自分の手帳電話で電話をします。

definition_en: A device for transmitting conversations and other sounds in real time across distances, now often a small portable unit also capable of running software etc.
example: I'm going to answer my phones. / 私は電話を応答します。

definition_en: A photograph.
example: I'll send you photos of my vacation. / 私は私の旅行の写真を送ります。

definition_en: A tool used for digging; a pickaxe.
meanings_ja: 採る (in a garden or orchard)
example: Can you pick this apple? / このリンゴを選んでください。

definition_en: A representation of anything (as a person, a landscape, a building) upon canvas, paper, or other surface, by drawing, painting, printing, photography, etc.
example: The picture on the wall is very old. / 壁の画像は非常に古い。

definition_en: A part of a larger whole, usually in such a form that it is able to be separated from other parts.
example: I'm looking for a piece of cake. / 私はケーキの小さな部分を探しています。

definition_en: (physical) An area; somewhere within an area.
meanings_ja: 位置 (when referring to a specific location or position)
example: I want to visit a new place in Tokyo. / トーキョーの新しい場所に旅行したいです。

definition_en: A drawing showing technical details of a building, machine, etc., with unwanted details omitted, and often using symbols rather than detailed drawing to represent doors, valves, etc.
meanings_ja: 作戦、計画 (more specific meanings, e.g. military planning or detailed planning)
example: I'm making a plan to travel to Japan next year. / 私は来年の日本旅行計画を立てます。

definition_en: Each of the seven major bodies which move relative to the fixed stars in the night sky—the Moon, Mercury, Venus, the Sun, Mars, Jupiter and Saturn.
example: The planet Earth is home to a diverse range of life. / 地球は多様な生命を宿している。

definition_en: Activity for amusement only, especially among the young.
meanings_ja: 実行する (in a sporting or musical context)
example: I'm going to play soccer with my friends tonight. / 君たちと今夜サッカーをする。

definition_en: To act in a manner such that one has fun; to engage in activities expressly for the purpose of recreation or entertainment.
example: She played tennis all day. / 彼女は全日テニスを戯した。

definition_en: One that plays
meanings_ja: 役割者、参加者 (in a team or organization)
example: The player scored a goal in the soccer game. / サッカーの試合でゴールを決めたゲームプレイヤー。

definition_en: To act in a manner such that one has fun; to engage in activities expressly for the purpose of recreation or entertainment.
example: I'm playing with my friends. / 私は友達と遊んでいる。

definition_en: A discrete division of something.
example: Can you point out the location on the map? / 地図上の場所を教えてください。

definition_en: A discrete division of something.
meanings_ja: 地点 (jisho) - a location or point on a map
ポイント (poinuto) - a point or advantage in an argument or discussion
example: The company's new product has several points that set it apart from its competitors. / その会社の新製品には、競合他社との異なるポイントがある。

definition_en: A person who is popular, especially at a school.
example: The new movie is very popular in Japan. / 新映画は、日本で非常に人気があります。

definition_en: A long dowel or plank protruding from the ground; a fencepost; a lightpost.
example: I need to post this letter today. / 今日にはこの手紙を送らねば。

definition_en: A flat-bottomed vessel (usually metal) used for cooking food.
example: The pot of gold at the end of the rainbow is a popular myth. / 虎の目の下に黄金が積まれているという話は、有名な俗説です。

definition_en: The current moment or period of time.
example: I'm excited to present my new product / 私は新製品を発表することにとてんとうに-excitedです

definition_en: An act in the past which may be used as an example to help decide the outcome of similar instances in the future.
example: The president of the United States is a powerful leader. / アメリカ合衆国の大統領は強力なリーダーです。

definition_en: A pretty person; a term of address to a pretty person.
example: She's a pretty girl. / 彼女は可愛らしい女性です。

definition_en: The cost required to gain possession of something.
example: The price of a new smartphone is very high. / 新しいスマートフォンの価格はとても高い。

definition_en: A difficulty that has to be resolved or dealt with.
meanings_ja: 問題点, 諸般の問題
example: The company is facing a major problem in the market. / その会社は市場で大きな問題に直面しています。

definition_en: A difficulty that has to be resolved or dealt with.
example: I'm having problems with my computer. / わたしのコンピューターに係難事があります。

definition_en: A set of structured activities.
example: I'm writing a program to control the robot. / ロボットを制御するプログラムを書きます。

definition_en: A right to sell something at a predetermined price.
example: I will put the book on the table. / 台所に本を置く。

definition_en: A sentence, phrase or word which asks for information, reply or response; an interrogative.
example: What's your favorite food? / お好きな食べ物は何ですか？

definition_en: A sentence, phrase or word which asks for information, reply or response; an interrogative.
example: What's your favorite color? / あなたの好きな色は何ですか？

definition_en: Rapidly; with speed; fast.
example: I'll finish my work quickly. / 私は仕事を早く終わらせます。

definition_en: To have rain fall from the sky.
meanings_ja: 降りてくる雨 ( rain that is falling)
example: It's raining. / 雨が降ってる。

definition_en: A reading or an act of reading, especially an actor's part of a play.
example: I love to read books. / 私は本を読むのが大好きです。

definition_en: A commodity; see realty.
example: "Is this a real diamond?" / "これは実際のダイヤモンドですか?"

definition_en: In a way or manner that is real, not unreal.
example: I'm really tired. / 私は疲れた。

definition_en: Any of a range of colours having the longest wavelengths, 670 nm, of the visible spectrum; a primary additive colour for transmitted light: the colour obtained by subtracting green and blue from white light using magenta and yellow filters; the colour of blood, ripe strawberries, etc.
example: The rose is red. / はあかです。

definition_en: To recall from one's memory; to have an image in one's memory.
example: I'll remember to buy milk on my way home. / ホームに帰る際に牛乳を買うことに思い出す。

definition_en: An instance of riding.
example: I'm going to ride my bike tomorrow. / 明日は自転車で遊びに行く。

definition_en: Straight, not bent.
example: I have the right to speak my mind. / 私は自分の意見を話す権利があります。

definition_en: A way used for travelling between places, originally one wide enough to allow foot passengers and horses to travel, now (US) usually one surfaced with asphalt or concrete and designed to accommodate many vehicles travelling in both directions. In the UK both senses are heard: a country road is the same as a country lane.
example: The road to success is long and difficult. / 成功の道は長く困難です。

definition_en: A formation of minerals, specifically:
meanings_ja: 音楽的グループ（e.g. rock band）
example: The rock fell from the mountain. / 山から岩が落下した。

definition_en: Opportunity or scope (to do something).
example: I need a room to study. / 私のための部屋が必要です。

definition_en: A shrub of the genus Rosa, with red, pink, white or yellow flowers.
example: The rose in my garden is beautiful. / わたしの庭には美しい花があります。

definition_en: So as to form a circle or trace a circular path, or approximation thereof.
meanings_ja: 輪回した, 環境的な
example: The company is going to have a round of funding. / 会社は資金を集める準備しています。

definition_en: To run.
example: I'm going to run a marathon tomorrow. / 明日マラソンを走ります。

definition_en: To move swiftly.
meanings_ja: 続ける (in a process or activity)
example: I've been running for three hours, and I'm getting tired. / 3時間走ってるけど疲れます。

definition_en: A weight of 1/288 of a pound, that is, twenty grains or one third of a dram, about 1.3 grams (symbol: ℈).
example: The s of his voice echoed through the valley / その声が谷を響かせた

definition_en: A box, usually made of metal, in which valuables can be locked for safekeeping.
meanings_ja: 些細ない、無害な (in some contexts)
example: The hotel room was safe and clean. / ホテルの部屋は安全で綺麗だった。

definition_en: Mentioned earlier; aforesaid.
example: She said she loved him. / 彼女は彼を愛していると言った。

definition_en: Not different or other; not another or others; not different as regards self; selfsame; identical.
example: The same recipe produces different results in different kitchens. / diffレシピも異なる結果を出してしまう。

meanings_ja: クリスマス・エイセイ
スラヴの伝統的な祝祭神 (traditional Slavic festival god)
example: Santa is coming tonight! / クリスマスは今夜来る！

definition_en: A tool with a toothed blade used for cutting hard substances, in particular wood or metal
meanings_ja: 観察、認識 (in a figurative sense)
example: I used a saw to cut the wood. / 木を切るために手斧を使った。

definition_en: A chance to speak; the right or power to influence or make a decision.
meanings_ja: 説明する (to explain or describe)
example: What does it say? / それは何を言うの？

definition_en: A chance to speak; the right or power to influence or make a decision.
meanings_ja: 声明する (in a formal or official sense)
example: He says he will be there tomorrow. / あの人は明日行くという。
The Scott family has been living in Edinburgh for generations. / スコット家はエディンバラで何世代にも住んでいる。

definition_en: Something that is number two in a series.
meanings_ja: 簡単、簡易 (in a context of simplicity or ease)
example: The second car to arrive was mine. / 私の車は、到着した2番目の車です。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
meanings_ja: 触れて知る (to see something and understand it)
example: I want to see the movie. / 私は映画をみたい。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
example: I'm always seeing new movies. / 私は常に新しい映画を見ている。

definition_en: To appear; to look outwardly; to be perceived as.
example: She seems tired. / 彼女は疲れたようだ。

definition_en: To appear; to look outwardly; to be perceived as.
meanings_ja: 客観的に見えるように
example: It seems that John will be late. / ジョンが遅れそうです。

definition_en: (stative) To perceive or detect with the eyes, or as if by sight.
example: I've seen that movie before. / その映画は私がみられた。

definition_en: An act of selling.
meanings_ja: 提供する (in a commercial sense)
example: I'm going to sell my old car. / 私は古い車を売る。

definition_en: The rising motion of water as a wave passes; a surge; the upward angular displacement of a vessel, opposed to pitch, the correlative downward movement.
example: I will send you an email. / ザ・エメールをあなたに送ります。

definition_en: Any of the manners by which living beings perceive the physical world: for humans sight, smell, hearing, touch, taste.
example: I have a sense of humor. / 私には笑いがあります。

definition_en: A subdivision of currency, equal to one hundredth of an Estonian kroon.
example: The letter was sent to him yesterday. / Yesterday, the letter was sent to him.
September is a great time to travel in Japan. / 九月は日本旅行のいい季節です。

definition_en: An area of land in private ownership (as opposed to common land).
example: I have several books on my shelf. / 私のシェルフにはいくつかの本があります。

definition_en: A portion of something, especially a portion given or allotted to someone.
example: I want to share this photo with my friends. / 私は友達にこの写真を分かけてみたい。

definition_en: A female.
example: She loves playing tennis. / 彼女はテニスが大好きです。

definition_en: A short circuit.
example: The short story was published in a magazine. / 短編小説は雑誌に出版された。

definition_en: (modal, auxiliary verb, defective) Used before a verb to indicate the simple future tense in the first person singular or plural.
meanings_ja: すべきである ( polite or formal situations)
example: I should study harder for my exam. / 私は試験のためにより努力する必要があります。
I should attend the meeting tomorrow. / 私は明日会議に参加する。

definition_en: A play, dance, or other entertainment.
example: The new phone show is very popular. / 新しいスマートフォンのショーは非常に人気です。

definition_en: A play, dance, or other entertainment.
example: The museum's new show features works by local artists. / 博物館の新しい展示は、地元アーティストたちの作品を特集しています。

definition_en: A bounding straight edge of a two-dimensional shape.
example: The side of the road was dirty. / 道路の側面は汚れていた。

definition_en: A herbal preparation made from one plant, as opposed to something made from more than one plant.
example: The instructions were simple and easy to follow. / 手順は簡単で読みやすかった。

definition_en: A man of a higher rank or position.
example: The old man, sir, is a famous artist. / はるこくじんはいったいせかいのかた

definition_en: Subsidence of the roof of a coal mine.
example: Can you sit down? / キミは座りなさい？

definition_en: Subsidence of the roof of a coal mine.
meanings_ja: 指名、任じる (in a formal or official sense)

definition_en: The digit or figure 6.
example: I have six friends. / 私は六人の友達があります。

definition_en: To rest in a state of reduced consciousness.
meanings_ja: 過眠 (if referring to excessive or uncontrolled sleep)
example: I'm going to bed now, so I'll sleep well tonight. / 今夜は寝ようから、また安心して寝ます。

definition_en: Someone who is slow; a sluggard.
meanings_ja: 速度が遅い, やわらか
example: The traffic is slow. / 交通は遅い。

definition_en: Any part of something that is smaller or slimmer than the rest, now usually with anatomical reference to the back.
example: The small dog ran quickly. / 小さな犬は速く走った。

definition_en: To hurt or sting.
meanings_ja: 技術的に優れている、インターネットを使用していることが多い
example: She's really smart and always stays up-to-date with the latest technology. / 彼女は本当に賢くて最新の技術にアップデートしたままです。

definition_en: True, accurate.
meanings_ja: そのくらい, やっぱり
example: I'm tired so I'll go to bed early. / 私は疲れているので早く寝ます。

definition_en: A soft or foolish person; an idiot.
example: The soft blanket was perfect for snuggling up. / やさしい布団は抱き合うのにぴったりだった。

definition_en: Of a measurement: approximately, roughly.
meanings_ja: ちょっと, かなりの
example: I'd like to have some coffee. / コーヒーをいくつか飲みたいです。

definition_en: A partially specified but unnamed person.
meanings_ja: 不特定の人物 (in a general or unspecified sense)
example: I need to talk to someone about this problem. / 私はこの問題について誰かと話したいです。

definition_en: An object whose nature is yet to be defined.
example: I need something to drink. / 私には飲むものが必要です。

definition_en: Former; sometime.
example: I don't always eat breakfast, sometimes I skip it. / 私は常習的に朝食を食べない、頻々に無くする。

definition_en: Short in length of time from the present.
example: I'll see you soon. / あなたと会うのをすぐにします。

definition_en: Healthy.
example: The sound of the waterfall was soothing. / waterfallの音が和らごしい。

definition_en: A sensation perceived by the ear caused by the vibration of air or some other medium.
example: The sounds of nature are very soothing. / 自然の音はとても心地よい。

definition_en: (heading) Of time.
meanings_ja: 空間、自由空間 (in a more general sense)
example: NASA is exploring the space. / NASAは宇宙を探検している。

definition_en: A low class bar, a speakeasy.
example: Can you speak with me in English? / アナタは英語で話せますか?

definition_en: A reduction in consumer cost (usually for a limited time) for items or services rendered.
example: This hotel has a special room with a great view. / このホテルには、最高の景色を持つスペシャルルームがあります。

definition_en: The faculty of uttering articulate sounds or words; the ability to speak or to use vocalizations to communicate.
example: "The company CEO gave a speech at the annual conference." / "会社のCEOが年次会議で講演を行いました。"

definition_en: Amount of money spent (during a period); expenditure.
example: I'm going to spend all day studying. / 私は今日全日勉強する。

definition_en: A support structure that connects the axle or the hub of a wheel to the rim.
meanings_ja: 車輪に火をつける (in the context of a wheel being set ablaze)
example: She spoke her mind about the issue. / 彼女はその問題について自分の意見を述べた。

definition_en: Any activity that uses physical exertion or skills competitively under a set of rules that is not based on aesthetics.
meanings_ja: スポーツ（具体的な競技のこと）
example: I love playing sports in my free time. / 私は休日には運動が大好きです。

definition_en: Expressing a sudden desire for silence.
example: The pilot had to st the plane during an emergency landing. / パイロットは緊急着陸の際に機をスタンドしなければならなかった。

definition_en: Any small luminous dot appearing in the cloudless portion of the night sky, especially with a fixed location relative to other such dots.
example: The movie star was a huge success. / 映画の有名スターは大成功を果たした。

definition_en: The beginning of an activity.
example: I will start learning Japanese next week. / 私は来週から日本語を学びます。

definition_en: To begin, commence, initiate.
example: I started my job yesterday. /昨日、私は新しい仕事を始めました。

definition_en: The beginning of an activity.
meanings_ja: 始まりがある、始動する
example: The new project starts tomorrow. / 新プロジェクトは明日から始まる。

definition_en: A stopping place.
meanings_ja: 店舗 (in a business or commercial context)
example: The train station is just around the corner. / 鉄道の駅はそこにあります。

definition_en: Continuance or a period of time spent in a place; abode for an indefinite time; sojourn.
meanings_ja: 留まる (留まるは、特に旅行などで長期的に滞在することを指す)
example: I'm going to stay at my friend's place tonight. / 私は今夜友達の家で宿泊します。

definition_en: An advance or movement made from one foot to the other; a pace.
meanings_ja: 位置 (in a process or sequence)
example: The company will take a step towards innovation by investing in new technology. / その会社は新しい技術に投資してイノベーションに向かって大きなステップを踏みます。

meanings_ja: スティブ（a male given name）
ステーブ（software developer, short for Steve Jobs）
example: My friend Steve is a great programmer. / スティブは素晴らしいプログラマーです。

definition_en: A period of calm or silence.
meanings_ja: 静かに、穏やかに (in a calm and peaceful manner)
example: The water was still on the lake, reflecting the surrounding mountains. / 湖の水は静かに、山々を反映していた。

definition_en: A (usually marked) place where buses, trams or trains halt to let passengers get on and off, usually smaller than a station.
example: Can you stop crying? / クライニーを止めろ

definition_en: A place where items may be accumulated or routinely kept.
meanings_ja: メモリーやデータなどを保存する装置 (in computing)
example: I'm going to the store to buy some clothes. / マンションに住む友達は、衣服を店で購入しています。

definition_en: A sequence of real or fictional events; or, an account of such a sequence.
meanings_ja: 小説 (story can also refer to a short novel or a narrative)
example: I'm going to tell you a story about my trip to Japan. / 私は日本旅行について語ります。

definition_en: A paved part of road, usually in a village or a town.
example: The street was crowded with people. / 道路は人々で混み合っていた。

definition_en: Capable of producing great physical force.
example: The athlete is strong. / 運動選手は強い。

definition_en: Something being indicated that is similar to something else.
meanings_ja: 何れの程度か (to what extent) / どのような (what kind of)
example: I've never seen such a beautiful sunset! / 私は、そのような美しい夕日を見たことがない！

definition_en: One of four seasons, traditionally the second, marked by the longest and typically hottest days of the year due to the inclination of the Earth and thermal lag. Typically regarded as being from June 21 to September 22 or 23 in parts of the USA, the months of June, July and August in the United Kingdom and the months of December, January and February in the Southern Hemisphere.
example: It's going to be a hot summer. /暑くなる夏です。

definition_en: A star, especially when seen as the centre of any single solar system.
example: The sun was shining brightly today. / 今日は太陽が明るく輝いていました。

definition_en: Of excellent quality, superfine.
meanings_ja: 超人的的（超能力を持つ）、非常に良好
example: This new phone is super! / この新しい電話はとても良い！

definition_en: Physically secure and certain, non-failing, reliable.
example: Are you sure you want to quit? / あなたは本当に辞めたいの？

meanings_ja: テンペラ (tempera) - a type of paint
タイム (time) - a unit of time
example: I have to be on time for my meeting today. / 今日の会議にはティームに間に合わせなくてはいけない。

definition_en: Furniture with a top surface to accommodate a variety of uses.
example: I need to set up a table for the party. / パーティー用のテーブルを設定する必要があります。

definition_en: The or an act of taking.
meanings_ja: 取得する, 採取する (to obtain or gather)
example: I will take a taxi to the airport. / アップルを取りに行くとタクシーで空港にいく

definition_en: The or an act of taking.
example: He takes a book from the shelf. / 彼は書棚から本を取りてくる。

definition_en: To communicate, usually by means of speech.
meanings_ja: 談話 (or 会話) - This meaning refers to a conversation or discussion between two or more people.
example: Let's talk about your plans. / あなたの計画について話そう。

definition_en: To communicate, usually by means of speech.
meanings_ja: 会談した (in a formal or official setting)
example: We talked about the new project. / 新プロジェクトについて話した。

definition_en: The action of the verb talk.
meanings_ja: 護論、討議 (in a formal or official setting)
example: Can we start talking about the project's progress? / プロジェクトの進捗を話してみましょうか？

definition_en: A set of draught animals, such as two horses in front of a carriage.
example: The company is sending a team to the conference. / 会社は会議にチームを派遣する。

definition_en: A telecommunication device (originally mechanical, and now electronic) used for two-way talking with another person (now often shortened to phone).
meanings_ja: コミュニケーション用具
example: Can I use my telephone to make a call? / コミュニケーション用具で電話をかけることができますか?

definition_en: A reflexive, often habitual behavior, especially one occurring in a context that often features attempts at deception by persons under psychological stress (such as a poker game or police interrogation), that reveals information that the person exhibiting the behavior is attempting to withhold.
example: Can you tell me what time it opens? / あなたは何時開くのか教えてください。

definition_en: A set or group with ten elements.
example: I have ten apples. / 私は10個のリンゴがあります。

definition_en: A challenge, trial.
example: The teacher gave us a test to see if we had learned the material. / 教師は私たちに学習した内容を確認するためテストを与えた。

definition_en: At that time; then.
example: I'm taller than my brother. / 兄は私より背が高くて。

definition_en: An expression of appreciation; a thought.
example: Can I thank you for your help? / 私はあなたの助けをありがとうございます。

definition_en: An expression of appreciation; a thought.
example: I'd like to thank you for your help. / あなたの助けに感謝したいと思います。

definition_en: Something being indicated that is there; one of those.
example: I saw the movie that she recommended. / 私は彼女が推薦した映画を見た。

definition_en: With a comparative or with more and a verb phrase, establishes a correlation with one or more other such comparatives.
meanings_ja: 一つ, この, 何か
example: I need a book. / 私は一冊の本が必要です。
Their car is red. / 彼らの自動車は赤い。

definition_en: (plural) Those ones.
example: The tourists were interested in them. / 旅客たちは彼らに興味を持っていた。

definition_en: Used in comparisons, to introduce the basis of comparison.
meanings_ja: そのため (in a causal relationship)
そういう場合 (in a hypothetical or conditional sense)
example: If it rains, we'll stay home and watch TV, and then go out later. / 雨が降れば、私たちはテレビを観て後に出かける。

definition_en: That place.
example: I'll meet you there at 5pm. / 5時5分、あそこで会おう。

definition_en: The thing, item, etc. being indicated.
meanings_ja: これは、我々の (referring to something belonging to oneself or one's group)
example: I like these shoes. / 私はこれらの靴が好きです。

definition_en: (the third-person plural) A group of people, animals, plants or objects previously mentioned.
example: They are coming to the party tonight. / 彼らは今夜のパーティーに来ます。

definition_en: That which is considered to exist as a separate entity, object, quality or concept.
meanings_ja: 何か (to indicate a vague or indefinite idea)
example: What's that thing you're holding? / その何かを持ちたまっています。

definition_en: That which is considered to exist as a separate entity, object, quality or concept.
meanings_ja: 物事 (monotsu) - general objects or matters
事実 (jijitsu) - facts or actual circumstances
そのもの (sono mono) - fundamental nature or essence
example: I'm cleaning up things around the house. / 家中を掃除しています。

definition_en: An act of thinking; consideration (of something).
meanings_ja: 考え合わせる (to think deeply or carefully), 考慮する (to consider)
example: I will think about it. / 私はそれについて考える。

definition_en: Thought; gerund of think.
meanings_ja: 思い通る (in a casual or impromptu manner)
example: I've been thinking about going to Japan. / 私は日本行きを考えています。

definition_en: An act of thinking; consideration (of something).
meanings_ja: 思う (more abstract or introspective thinking)
example: He thinks he's a good driver, but I think otherwise. / 彼は自分がいい運転手であると考えるけれど、私はそうとは思えない。

definition_en: The person or thing in the third position.
meanings_ja: 最初のものの次に来るもの
example: The third runner crossed the finish line. / 三番目のランナーはフィニッシュラインを超えた。

definition_en: Something being indicated that is here; one of these.
example: This is a great book. / これは素晴らしい本です。

definition_en: (demonstrative) The thing, person, idea, quality, event, action or time indicated or understood from context, especially if more remote geographically, temporally or mentally than one designated as "this", or if expressing distinction.
example: Those who are willing to learn will be successful. / 学習したい人は成功する。

definition_en: To ponder, to go over in one's head.
example: I had a great thought. / 私はいい考えを持った。

definition_en: A numerical value equal to 1,000 = 10 × 100 = 103
example: I've traveled to over a thousand places around the world. / わたしは世界中1000以上の場所を旅しました。

definition_en: The digit/figure 3.
example: I have three dogs. / 私には三匹の犬があります。

definition_en: A large slab of stone laid in a dry-stone wall from one side to the other; a perpend.
meanings_ja: その中を通り抜ける (to pass through something)
その結果や影響を通じて (as a result or via influence)
example: I went through the forest to get to the other side. / わたしは森を通り抜けてもう一方の側にいった。
The concert starts at tim. / コンサートは、ティム（時間）に始まる。

definition_en: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
meanings_ja: 機会 (in the phrase "a good time" or "take time")
example: I have a good time to travel. / 私には旅行する機会があります。

definition_en: The inevitable progression into the future with the passing of present and past events.
example: The times were changing rapidly. / 時は急速に変わっていた。

definition_en: Toward a closed, touching or engaging position.
meanings_ja: ~するための手段や方法 (方法を示す)
example: I'm going to the store. / 私は店に行きます。

definition_en: A current day or date.
example: I'm going to the park today. / 私は今、この公園に行く。

definition_en: Coherent; well organized.
example: We're going to the concert together. / 我々はコンサートに行くために一緒にいる。
I'm going to Tokyo. / トーキョーに行きます。

definition_en: (archaic outside of idioms) To count, reckon, or enumerate.
meanings_ja: 教える (in a context where someone is sharing knowledge or information)
example: She told me the news. / 彼女は私にニュースを述べた。

definition_en: The day after the present day.
meanings_ja: 来週（if tomorrow refers to a day in the near future）
example: I'm going to meet my friend tomorrow. / 私は明日友達と会うつもりです。

definition_en: (focus) Likewise.
example: I'm going to the movies tonight, and my friend is coming too. / 今夜私は映画に行きますし、友達も来る。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 取り上げた (を持ち帰るやうとした)
example: I took a book from the library. / 私は図書館から本をとった。

definition_en: The highest or uppermost part of something.
example: The top of the mountain is very challenging to climb. / 山頂は非常に困難な登山です。

definition_en: Subject; theme; a category or general area of interest.
example: What's the topic of your presentation? / あなたのプレゼンテーションの主題は何ですか？

definition_en: A settlement; an area with residential districts, shops and amenities, and its own local government; especially one larger than a village and smaller than a city.
meanings_ja: 小都市 (in a more general sense)
example: The town is famous for its beautiful park. / この小都市はその美しい公園で有名です。

definition_en: The act of traveling; passage from place to place.
example: I'm planning to travel to Japan next year. / 次年は日本へツアーに行く計画です。

definition_en: A journey; an excursion or jaunt
meanings_ja: 落下, 乗り物の事故 (in this case, "trip" means a fall or an accident)
example: I'm planning a trip to Tokyo. / トウキョーに旅行しよう。

definition_en: The state of being in alignment.
example: The true answer is 42. / 実際の答えは42です。

definition_en: An attempt.
meanings_ja: attempt to, give it a shot
example: I'm going to try this new restaurant. / 今、私たちはこの新しいレストランを試そう。

definition_en: Two times.
example: I've tried to solve this puzzle twice, but still can't get it right. / 私はこのパズルを二回、でもまだ正解できません。

definition_en: The digit/figure 2.
example: I have two dogs. / 私は二匹の犬があります。

definition_en: A grouping based on shared characteristics; a class.
meanings_ja: 類型 (rui-gata) - referring to a category or classification
型 (gatya) - referring to a template or pattern, often used in computing
example: What type of music do you like? / おなじみの音楽タイプは何ですか？

definition_en: The name of the Latin-script letter U.
meanings_ja: (yo) - a casual particle used to seek agreement or confirmation
- an abbreviation of "you" in informal writing or texting
example: "Do you want to go?" / "u?"

definition_en: Being lower; being beneath something.
example: The book is under my bed. / その本は私のベッドの下にある。

definition_en: To grasp a concept fully and thoroughly, especially (of words, statements, art, etc.) to be aware of the meaning of and (of people) to be aware of the intent of.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help! 😊

理解する

* 主要な意味1: 人間の心を読み取り、意図や感情を理解する
* 主要な意味2: 記述や説明を捉え、内容を把握する

例文: I understand the instructions, but can you explain it again? / 私は説明が分かるけど、再度説明してくれないか?

Note: There may be additional meanings or nuances of the word "understand", but the above two main meanings are the most common and widely accepted translations.
example: I understand the instructions, but can you explain it again? / 私は説明が分かるけど、再度説明してくれないか?

definition_en: The direction opposed to the pull of gravity.
example: The company is going up in value. / 会社の価値が上がっています。

definition_en: (personal) Me and at least one other person; the objective case of we.
example: We are the us. /私たちは私たちです。

definition_en: The act of using.
meanings_ja: 使用する, 利用する
example: I will use this phone. / 私はこの電話を使用します。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
example: The old car was used. / オールドカーは使われていた。

definition_en: True, real, actual.
example: I'm very tired. / 私は非常に疲れました。

definition_en: A rampart of earth, stones etc. built up for defensive purposes.
example: The wall was covered with ivy. / イブリーで覆われた壁だった。

definition_en: A desire, wish, longing.
meanings_ja: 需要する (for physical or emotional needs)
example: I want to go home tonight. / 私は今夜帰りたい。

definition_en: To wish for or desire (something); to feel a need or desire for; to crave or demand.
meanings_ja: 探している (for "wanted" as a verb, meaning to look for or seek)
example: The police wanted me for questioning. / 警察が尋問するために私を捜索した。

definition_en: A desire, wish, longing.
example: He wants to travel around the world. / 彼は世界を旅行したい。

definition_en: Organized, large-scale, armed conflict between countries or between national, ethnic, or other sizeable groups, usually involving the engagement of military forces.
example: The war in Europe lasted for four years. / 欧州の戦争は4年続きました。

meanings_ja: used to, had been doing something
example: I was studying English last year. / 私は去年英語を勉強していました。

definition_en: A portable or wearable timepiece.
meanings_ja: 時計をめざす (secondarily, "watch" can also mean to pay attention or observe something)
example: I'm going to watch a movie tonight. / 今夜は映画を見ます。

definition_en: To look at, see, or view for a period of time.
meanings_ja: 見ていた (to have seen or observed something)
example: I watched the sunrise from the mountain top. / 山頂から日出を見た。

definition_en: (heading) To do with a place or places.
example: This is not my way. / 私の手段じゃない。

definition_en: (heading) To do with a place or places.
example: I've found many ways to improve my English. / 私は私の英検を向上させるための多くの方法を見つけた。

definition_en: (personal) The speakers/writers, or the speaker/writer and at least one other person (not the person being addressed). (This is the exclusive we.)
example: We are going to the park. / 僊々は公園に行く。
I have a meeting on Wednesday. / 水曜に会議があります。

definition_en: Any period of seven consecutive days.
meanings_ja: 7日間 (in a more formal or scientific context)
example: I'm going to be on vacation for a week. / 私は一週間の休暇をとります。

definition_en: Any period of seven consecutive days.
example: I've been studying English for three weeks, and I'm starting to feel more confident. / 私は3週間 英語を勉強していて、自信を持つようになりました。

definition_en: The act of greeting someone’s arrival, especially by saying "Welcome!"; reception.
example: "Welcome to our home!" / ""

definition_en: In good health.
example: The well-designed system worked smoothly. / 上手なシステムは滑らかに機能した。

definition_en: To move:
meanings_ja: きれた (in the sense of "has gone" or "had gone")
example: I went to the store yesterday. / 私は昨日店にいってきました。

definition_en: A man, a husband
example: I was a student; I were a teacher. / 私は学生でした；私たちは教師でした。

meanings_ja: (dekinakatta) - couldn't have done something (in the past)
example: I wasn't feeling well, so I didn't go to work. / よくなかったので、出勤しなかった。

definition_en: (Singlish) Used to contradict an underlying assumption held by the interlocutor.
example: What's your favorite food? / お好みの食材は何ですか？

definition_en: The time at which something happens.
example: What do you like to do when you're on vacation? / お休みの際は何を好きですか?

definition_en: The place in which something happens.
example: Where are you going? / あなたはどこ行きますか？

definition_en: (interrogative) What one or ones (of those mentioned or implied).
