example: I like reading books, but which one should I choose? / 私は本を読むのが好きなのですが、どれを選ぶべきですか?

definition_en: The color/colour of snow or milk; the colour of light containing equal amounts of all visible wavelengths.
meanings_ja: 白い（shiroi） - referring to the color white or something that is literally white
晴れの（hare no） - meaning pure, innocent, or spotless in a moral sense
example: The bride wore a beautiful white dress. / 花嫁は美しい白いドレスを着た。

definition_en: A person under discussion; a question of which person.
example: Who is going to the party? / その人パーティに行くのか?

definition_en: (interrogative) That or those of whom or belonging to whom.
meanings_ja: その所有者の、所持者の
example: The car is whose? / それは誰の車か？

definition_en: Reason
example: I don't know why she's late. / 彼女が遅れている理由はわからない。

definition_en: A ball that passes so far from the batsman that the umpire deems it unplayable; the arm signal used by an umpire to signal a wide; the extra run added to the batting side's score
example: The new highway is wide and safe. / 新しい高速道路は広く安全です。

definition_en: A married woman, especially in relation to her spouse.
example: My wife and I will travel to Tokyo. / 私と妻は東京に旅行します。

definition_en: (now uncommon or literary) To wish, desire (something).
example: I will go to the store tomorrow. / 私は明日店に行く。

definition_en: To conquer, defeat.
example: I'm going to win this game! / わたしはこのゲームを優勝する！

definition_en: The inedible parts of a grain-producing plant.
example: The windows of my room have a great view. / 私の部屋の画面は眺望が良い。

definition_en: A desire, hope, or longing for something or for something to happen.
example: I wish it would stop raining. / 雨が止まることを願っている。

definition_en: Along, together with others, in a group, etc.
meanings_ja: 共に (kyou ni) - This is the most common meaning of "with", implying being together or in company.
伴い (atai) - This translation conveys the idea of accompanying or following something or someone.
example: I'll go to the party with my friends. / 私は友達とパーティーに行く。

definition_en: To conquer, defeat.
meanings_ja: 優勝する (to win first place)
取得する (to gain or acquire something)
example: She won the prize for her excellent work. / 彼女は優秀な仕事で賞を取得した。

definition_en: Tending to excite wonder; surprising, extraordinary.
example: The fireworks display was wonderful! / 火打ちの展示はスーパーでした！

definition_en: (heading) Employment.
meanings_ja: 業務, 作業 (複数の仕事を指す場合)
example: I'm going to work tomorrow. / 明日は働きます。

definition_en: To do a specific task by employing physical or mental powers.
meanings_ja: 努力した (if the context suggests physical or mental effort)
example: I worked all night to finish the project. / 私はプロジェクトを完成するために全夜働きました。

definition_en: (usually in the plural) Operation; action.
example: I'm working on a project. / 私はプロジェクトに奮作中です。

definition_en: (with "the") Human collective existence; existence in general.
meanings_ja: ユニバース (地球や宇宙を指す場合)
example: The new technology has the potential to change the world. / 新技術は世界を変える可能性を持つ。

definition_en: Something that would happen, or would be the case, under different circumstances; a potentiality.
meanings_ja: 将来の可能性を示す (to indicate a possibility of something happening in the future)
example: I would like to travel abroad. / 私は旅行に出たいと思います。
I wouldn't eat that spicy food. / 私はあの辛い料理を食べない。

definition_en: Graphism of symbols such as letters that express some meaning.
example: The students are doing their writing homework. / 生徒たちは宿題の書きをしています。

definition_en: To form letters, words or symbols on a surface in order to communicate.
example: She wrote a letter to her friend. / 彼女は友人に手紙を書いた。

definition_en: Expressing joy, celebration, glee, etc.
example: "Do you want to go out tonight?" / "Yeah, I'd love to!"

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).
meanings_ja: 時期 (時系列でいう1年の区間)
example: It's been a great year for me. / 私にとっては偉大な一年になった。

definition_en: A solar year, the time it takes the Earth to complete one revolution of the Sun (between 365.24 and 365.26 days depending on the point of reference).
example: I've been studying English for years, and now I can speak fluently. / 私は多くの年間に英語を学んでいて、現在は流暢に話すことができます。

definition_en: The colour of gold, butter, or a lemon; the colour obtained by mixing green and red light, or by subtracting blue from white light.
meanings_ja: (momo iro) - a shade of yellow, like the fruit
example: The sun was shining brightly in the sky, casting a warm yellow glow over the landscape. / (sora ni taiyou wa takakete, kiiro na kage o teikaku de aru jōdai deshita.)

definition_en: An affirmative expression; an answer that shows agreement or acceptance.
example: "Do you want to go?" / "はい、行きます"

definition_en: The day immediately before today; one day ago.
meanings_ja: 直前、前日 (in formal or literary contexts)
example: I went to the park yesterday. / 私は昨日公園に行きました。

definition_en: To address (a person) using the pronoun you (in the past, especially to use you rather than thou, when you was considered more formal).
example: What do you want to do today? / 今日は何して欲しいの？

meanings_ja: あなたの所有物、関係者
example: Can I borrow your book? / 私はあなたの本を借りることができますか？

definition_en: That which belongs to you (singular); the possessive second-person singular pronoun used without a following noun.
meanings_ja: その人の所有物 (referring to someone else's possession)
example: The gift is yours. / その贈り物はあなたの所有物です。

definition_en: (reflexive pronoun) Your own self (singular).
example: I should take care of myself. / 私は自分自身を気遣うべきです。

definition_en: To endure without yielding; to withstand; await defiantly; to encounter; to persevere.
example: I will abide by the rules. / ルールに服従する。

definition_en: A large quantity; many.
example: The farm's abundance of fresh produce made it a popular destination. / その農場の新鮮な農産物の多さで人気のあるdestinationとなった。

definition_en: One who, or that which, accelerates.
meanings_ja: 排気ガス加速器 (for a specific type of accelerator)
example: The car's engine needs an accelerator to reach high speeds. / 車のエンジンは、高速度に達するために加速器が必要です。

meanings_ja: アルコール (alcohol) (in chemistry and biology contexts)
example: The artist used acrylic paint for her mural. / アーティストはアクリルの絵具を壁画に使った。

definition_en: The action of adjusting something
example: The company made adjustments to their pricing strategy. / その会社は価格戦略を変更した。

definition_en: The act of administering; government of public affairs; the service rendered, or duties assumed, in conducting affairs; the conducting of any office or employment; direction.
example: The company's administration is responsible for managing its employees. / その会社の管理部門は従業員を管理しています。

definition_en: The act of adopting.
example: The organization provides adoption services to families. /その組織は家族に養子縁のサービスを提供しています。

definition_en: (often in the plural) Something which is done or is to be done; business of any kind, commercial, professional, or public.
meanings_ja: 関係 (in a romantic or professional sense)
example: He had an affair with a famous actress. / 彼は有名女優と恋人関係を持っていた。

definition_en: Characterized by aggression; unjustly attacking; prone to behave in a way that involves attacking or arguing.
meanings_ja: 野心的 (in a competitive or business sense)
example: The company's aggressive marketing strategy helped them gain a larger market share. / その企業は攻撃的なマーケティング戦略によって更に大きな市場シェアを得た。
The company's agi was impressive. / その会社の順調は印象的でした。

definition_en: A type of three-toed sloth, Bradypus tridactylus, endemic to forests of southern Venezuela, the Guianas, and northern Brazil.
example: The couple's love for each other was strong. / そのカップルは互いに強い愛を持っていた。

definition_en: A narrow street or passageway, especially one through the middle of a block giving access to the rear of lots or buildings.
example: The country's allies were crucial in its economic recovery. / 自国の共闘国は経済復興に大いに役立った。
I went all in on my investment. / 私は投資にすべてを賭けてしまった。

definition_en: A situation which allows a mutually exclusive choice between two or more possibilities; a choice between two or more possibilities.
example: We considered alternative ways to solve the problem. / 我々は問題を解決するための他の選択肢を検討しました。

definition_en: A minister of the highest rank sent to a foreign court to represent there his sovereign or country. (Sometimes called ambassador-in-residence)
example: The ambassador to Japan is a key figure in international diplomacy. / 日本の外交官は国際的な外交政策で重要な役割を果たす。

meanings_ja: AMD (Advanced Micro Devices) - コンピューター・マイクロプロセッサの製造企業
AMD (after meeting/dating) - その後、出会った/デートしたこと
example: After the conference, I met a great person and we are going to AMD this weekend. / その後、会議で知り合い、その週末にデートする plan。

definition_en: A relationship of resemblance or equivalence between two situations, people, or objects, especially when used as a basis for explanation or extrapolation.
example: The teacher used an analogy to explain the complex concept. / 教師は複雑な概念を説明するために類推を使用した。

definition_en: A robot that is designed to look and act like a human being (not necessarily male)
meanings_ja: スマートフォンやタブレットなどの携帯情報端末 (referring to Android operating system)
example: Google's Android is a popular smartphone OS. / グーグルのアンドロイドは人気のスマートフォンOSです。

definition_en: Something or someone of any value; any portion of one's property or effects so considered.
example: The company's biggest asset is its experienced team. / その会社の最大の資産は経験豊富なチームです。

definition_en: Something or someone of any value; any portion of one's property or effects so considered.
meanings_ja: 人材 (in the context of human resources)
example: The company's assets include its skilled employees and modern equipment. / その会社の財産にはスキルたける従業員や近代的設備が含まれる。

definition_en: The act of associating.
meanings_ja: 組織、クラブ (in this sense, it refers to professional organizations or clubs)
example: The company has several associations with other businesses in the industry. / その企業は、その業界の他の企業との何人か関係がある。

definition_en: Permission.
example: The system requires authorization to access the data. / システムではデータアクセスには権限付与が必要です。

definition_en: A feeling of fear and reverence.
example: The majesty of the mountains filled me with awe. / 山の偉大さに嫌悪感が湧いた。

definition_en: To go in the reverse direction.
example: The team is providing backing for the new project. / チームは新しいプロジェクトの裏付けを提供しています。

definition_en: To give as its foundation or starting point; to lay the foundation of.
example: The company is basing its new strategy on market research. / その会社は市場調査に基づいて新しい戦略を策定している。

definition_en: Something that is beneficial.
example: The exercise was beneficial for my health. / これらの運動は私の健康にとって有用でした。

meanings_ja: (anime and manga production company, founded by Hiroshi and Nobuhiko Besson)
example: The film was produced by the famous anime studio, Besson. / Bessonが制作した映画は有名なアニメスタジオでした。

definition_en: Best friend
example: My bestie and I went to the movies last weekend. / 僕の最高の友人と映画を見に行った。

definition_en: Best friend
example: My besties and I went to the movies last night. / 私の最好の友人と一緒に映画を見に行きました。

meanings_ja: ジョー・バイデン（Joe Biden）
米大統領候補者（presidential candidate of the United States）
example: Joe Biden was elected as the 46th President of the United States. / ジョー・バイデンはアメリカ第46代大統領に選出された。

meanings_ja: ブラックウェル（出版社）
ブラックウェルの人名（例えば、サミュエル・テイラー・コルトン・ブラックウェル）
example: The book was published by Blackwell. / ブラックウェルによって出版された。

definition_en: A violent gust of wind.
example: The firework's blast illuminated the night sky. / 夜空を照らし爆発した火花。

definition_en: A shared record of past transactions in a cryptocurrency network.
meanings_ja: 分散型データベース (distributed database)
example: The company is using blockchain technology to secure their transactions. / その会社は、トランザクションをセキュアにするためにブロックチェーン技術を使用しています。

meanings_ja: フィナンシャル・ニュース・メディア
米国金融 conglomerate の名称
example: Bloomberg reports that the economy is growing. / ブルームバーグは、経済が成長していると報道する。
The bohemian lifestyle is appealing to many young people. / ボヘミアンのライフスタイルは多くの若い人々に魅力的です。

definition_en: Evidence of a long-term debt, by which the bond issuer (the borrower) is obliged to pay interest when due, and repay the principal at maturity, as specified on the face of the bond certificate. The rights of the holder are specified in the bond indenture, which contains the legal terms and conditions under which the bond was issued. Bonds are available in two forms: registered bonds, and bearer bonds.
example: The company issued bonds to raise capital. / その会社は資金を調達するために債券を発行した。

definition_en: A low-pitched, resonant sound, such as of an explosion.
meanings_ja: 増加、急増 (e.g. a boom in sales)
example: The fireworks ended with a big boom! / Fireworks ended with a large sound!
The Bose Corporation is a well-known manufacturer of high-fidelity speakers. / ボーズコーポレーションは高品位スピーカーの有名な製造者です。

definition_en: To change the direction of motion after hitting an obstacle.
example: The kids were bouncing on the trampoline all day long. / 子供たちは全日中をトランポリンにぶん揺りした。

definition_en: An advance through and past enemy lines.
example: Scientists have made several breakthroughs in the field of medicine. / 医学分野で複数の新技術を発見しました。

definition_en: Widely and openly.
example: The new policy will be implemented broadly across the country. / 新しい政策は全国に広く実施される。

definition_en: A mediator between a buyer and seller.
example: The company hired brokers to negotiate a deal. / その会社は取引の仲介を中間者に任せた。

definition_en: A male deer, antelope, sheep, goat, rabbit, hare, and sometimes the male of other animals such as the hamster, ferret and shad.
example: The hunter went out to look for bucks. / 男性の鹿を捕まえるために、猟師は出かけた。

definition_en: A group of objects held together by wrapping or tying.
meanings_ja: 複数の物を一括りにしたもの
example: I bundled up warm clothes for my trip. / 私は旅行のために暖かい服類をまとめました。

definition_en: To determine the value of something or the solution to something by a mathematical process.
example: The new product was calculated to increase sales by 20%. / 新製品は20%増加することを予測して作られた。

definition_en: The act or process of calculating.
example: The company used advanced calculations to predict market trends. / その企業は市場のトレンドを予測するために、最先端の数値計算を使用した。

definition_en: One who has been captured or is otherwise confined.
example: The zoo took in a captive orangutan to care for it. / ズーは、監禁されたオランウータンを世話するために受け入れた。

definition_en: A person skilled at carpentry, the trade of cutting and joining timber in order to construct buildings or other structures.
meanings_ja: 建築屋 (if referring to a construction company)
example: The carpenters worked tirelessly to build a new house. / 新しい家を建てるために、木工師たちは尽力した。

definition_en: To assign a category; to divide into classes.
meanings_ja: まとめる (when categorizing is used in a broader sense, e.g., grouping similar things together)
example: I need to categorize these files by type and date. / 私はこれらのファイルを種類と日付で分類する必要があります。
The CEO of XYZ Inc. made a major announcement yesterday. / XYZインクのCEOは昨日大々発表をしました。

definition_en: To invite (someone) to take part in a competition.
meanings_ja: 扰う（かおる） - to disturb or interrupt
問題に直面する（もんだいにちょくめんする） - to face a challenge or problem
example: The new policy will be challenged by many critics. / 新しいポリシーは多くの批判者によって 扰うことになる。

definition_en: One who challenges; especially, one who plays against the current champion of a game or contest in hopes of winning and becoming the new champion.
example: The company's challengers were several other tech startups. / その会社の対抗者は数々の他のテックスタートアップだった。

definition_en: A control on a carburetor to adjust the air/fuel mixture when the engine is cold.
example: The fire choked the room with thick smoke. / 火災が部屋に濃い煙を充満した。

definition_en: Chromium, when used to plate other metals.
meanings_ja: ブラウザ (if referring to Google Chrome browser)
example: I love the new chrome wheels on my car. / 私の自動車には新しいメタルコートのホイールがあります。

definition_en: (of liquids, such as wine or syrup) To make clear or bright by freeing from feculent matter
example: The company will clarify their policy on social media to avoid confusion. / その会社はソーシャルメディアのポリシーを明確にし混乱を避ける。

definition_en: The state or measure of being clear, either in appearance, thought or style; lucidity.
example: The report's clarity helped me understand the situation quickly. / 報告書の真意の明快さで状況を早く理解した。

definition_en: A group or bunch of several discrete items that are close to each other.
example: The stars in the sky formed a cluster. / 天の星がまとまり、大きなグループを形成した。

definition_en: Agent noun of coast: one who coasts.
example: I put a coaster under my beer glass to prevent water rings. / ビールグラスにパームトップを置いて水 ring を防ぐ。

definition_en: To write software programs.
meanings_ja: プログラミングの作業
コーディング (in biology) - referring to the process of encoding genetic information into a sequence
example: The coding of this gene is responsible for its expression. / この遺伝子のコーディングによりその発現が決まる。

definition_en: A rectangular closed box in which the body of a dead person is placed for burial.
example: The funeral procession carried the coffin to the grave. / 葬式の行進隊が墓地まで棺を運んだ。

definition_en: To work together with others to achieve a common goal.
example: The company will collaborate with other firms to develop a new product. / その会社は他社と共同で新製品を開発する。

definition_en: The act of collaborating.
example: The company and non-profit organization collaborated on a community project. / コンパニーとNPOは、コミュニティープロジェクトに共同で取り組んだ。

definition_en: A celestial body consisting mainly of ice, dust and gas in a (usually very eccentric) orbit around the Sun and having a "tail" of matter blown back from it by the solar wind as it approaches the Sun.
example: The comet will pass close to Earth next year. / fire星が地球に接近する現象

definition_en: A divinely ordained command, especially one of the Ten Commandments.
example: The Ten Commandments were written by Moses. / モーゼスが書いた十戒は存在した。

definition_en: An advocate of a society based on the common ownership of property; a proponent of communism.
meanings_ja: 社会的平等の実現を目指す思想運動
example: The communist party has been a major force in international politics. / 共産党は国際政治で大きな役割を果たしてきた。

definition_en: A friend, acquaintance, or partner; someone with whom one spends time or keeps company
meanings_ja: 友人 (in a social or recreational context)
example: We've been traveling companions for years. / 私たちは数年間の旅行仲間です。

definition_en: A person or organization against whom one is competing.
example: The competitor in the marathon was very strong. / マラソンの対抗者は非常に強い。

definition_en: The state of being complex; intricacy; entanglement.
meanings_ja: 難解な状況や問題の深み
example: The complexity of the project made it difficult to complete on time. / プロジェクトの複雑さにより、期限内に完了することが困難だった。

definition_en: A smaller, self-contained part of a larger entity. Often refers to a manufactured object that is part of a larger device.
example: The company produces various components for industrial machinery. / その会社は工業機械の部品を生産しています。

definition_en: To include, comprise; to contain.
example: I struggled to comprehend the complex mathematical concept. / 私は複雑な数学的概念を理解できなかった。

definition_en: The settlement of differences by arbitration or by consent reached by mutual concessions.
meanings_ja: 互恵の調整 (this is a secondary meaning, referring to finding a mutually beneficial solution)
example: The two parties reached a compromise on the trade agreement. / 二つのパーティーは貿易協定についての中間の取引に達した。

definition_en: The settlement of differences by arbitration or by consent reached by mutual concessions.
example: The two sides had to make compromises on the treaty. / 二つの側は条約について互恵的決断を取らねばならなかった。

definition_en: Computational power
meanings_ja: 考慮・推測して決断する (less common)
example: I will compute the total cost. / 私は合計額を計算します。

definition_en: To stand or meet facing, especially in competition, hostility or defiance; to come face to face with
meanings_ja: 対峙する, 対決する
example: "I was forced to confront my fears and doubts." / 「自分の恐怖や疑念に直面してしまった」

definition_en: To stand or meet facing, especially in competition, hostility or defiance; to come face to face with
meanings_ja: ぶつかる (in a physical or emotional sense)
example: The company confronts its financial troubles. / コンパニーは財務難を対決する。

definition_en: A person who favors maintenance of the status quo.
example: The politician is a conservative and opposes tax increases. / 政治家は税増反対の保守的考えを持ちます。

definition_en: To build or form (something) by assembling parts.
example: The company is constructing a new office building. / その会社は新しいオフィスビルを建設中です。

definition_en: To seek the opinion or advice of another; to take counsel; to deliberate together; to confer.
meanings_ja: 企業諮問 (mainly in business context)
example: I hired a consulting firm to help me with my marketing strategy. / 私はマーケティング戦略の助けにコンサルティングファームを雇用しました。

definition_en: The act of eating, drinking or using.
example: The company's consumption of natural resources has increased significantly. / その会社は自然資源の消費が著しく増えました。

definition_en: To hold inside.
meanings_ja: 中身を含む (in a physical sense, e.g. a container holds something inside)
example: The package contained a surprise gift. / パッケージは驚きのギフトが含まれていた。

definition_en: The act or state of continuing or being continued; uninterrupted extension or succession
example: The company will continue to operate in Japan. / その会社は、日本で営業を続ける。

definition_en: An agreement between two or more parties, to perform a specific job or work order, often temporary or of fixed duration and usually governed by a written agreement.
example: I signed a contract to buy a new car. / 私は新しい自動車を購入するために契約書にサインした。

definition_en: A debate or discussion of opposing opinions; (generally) strife.
example: There were many controversies surrounding her new album. / 彼女の新アルバムは多くの論争に包まれていた。

definition_en: To move (something) from one place to another.
meanings_ja: 輸送する (in a physical sense, e.g. transporting goods)
example: The company will convey its message through social media. / その会社はSNSを通じて自分のメッセージを伝える。

definition_en: The central part of fruit, containing the kernels or seeds.
example: The company's core values are honesty and integrity. / その会社の中心的価値は、誠実性と正直さです。

definition_en: A unit of measurement of the number of typographic characters that fit on a one inch line of printed type. This unit is mainly used to specify font sizes that have the same width for each character (monospaced), however it may also be used to give an average for fonts with characters of varying widths.
meanings_ja: (経済) 輸送価格指数 (少数派の用法)
example: The CPI rose by 2% last year. / 最年、CPIは2%上昇した。

definition_en: To form cracks.
example: This new restaurant is really cracking! / この新しいレストランはすげえ良い！

definition_en: The act of criticising; a critical judgment passed or expressed
meanings_ja: 評判 (in the context of art, music, etc.)
example: The new movie received many criticisms from critics and audiences alike. / 新映画は評判が悪く、批評家や観客から多くの非難を受けた。
The sailor checked his compass to ensure he was on course, not just cruising through the waters. / 航海士はコンパスを確認して、コースを保つように航海していた。

definition_en: A digital currency based on a cryptographic system.
example: The popularity of cryptocurrency has increased in recent years. / 最近years、デジタル通貨の人気度が増加しています。

definition_en: To restore to health.
example: The company is working on a new technology to curing cancer. / その会社はがんの治療技術開発に取り組んでいます。

definition_en: A gentle bend, such as in a road.
example: The curve of the road was treacherous. / 道の曲線は危険だった。

definition_en: Because
meanings_ja: あの、( informal usage, equivalent to "because")
example: I'm tired cuz I didn't sleep well last night. / 私は昨夜寝てないため疲れた。

definition_en: District court
meanings_ja: コンピュータネットワークで使用される電信方式
example: The company is looking for a dc converter. / その会社はdcコンバーターを探している。

definition_en: Deficiency in amount or quality; a falling short; lack.
meanings_ja: 財務赤字 (mainly referring to financial deficit)
example: The country is facing a significant budget deficit. /ountryは大きな予算不足に直面しています。

definition_en: A valley, especially in the form of a natural hollow, small and deep.
meanings_ja: コンピューターハードウェアのブランド (Dell Inc.)
example: The dell in the forest was home to many birds. / 森にいた谷は多くの鳥の家宅だった。

definition_en: To request forcefully.
example: He's a demanding boss, always pushing us to meet tight deadlines. / 彼は強要的な上司で、常に早期の締め切りに達するように促す。

definition_en: A supporter of democracy; an advocate of democratic politics (originally as opposed to the aristocrats in Revolutionary France).
meanings_ja: 政治システムで選挙や議会参加が自由に行えるシステムの指導者
example: The democrat won the election with a strong campaign. / ドemocラットは強力なキャンペーンで選挙に勝った。

definition_en: A demonstration or visual explanation.
example: The company will be hosting demos of their new product at the trade show. / 会社は新製品のデモを商業ショーで開催します。

definition_en: That which describes; a word, phrase, etc. serving as a description.
example: The company uses descriptors to classify its products. / その会社は製品を分類するために説明語を使用しています。

definition_en: In a desperate manner; without regard to danger or safety; recklessly.
example: I was desperately trying to find my phone. / 私は私の電話を探していた。

definition_en: A person or entity engaged in the creation or improvement of certain classes of products.
example: The developer created a new app. / 新しいアプリケーションを開発した。

definition_en: A person or entity engaged in the creation or improvement of certain classes of products.
meanings_ja: 新しいプロジェクトを進行する者
example: Our company hired a team of developers to create a new mobile app. / 我们公司雇用了一班开发者来创建一个新的移动应用程序。

definition_en: To determine which disease is causing a sick person's signs and symptoms; to find the diagnosis.
example: The doctor made a diagnosis of diabetes. / Doctorは糖尿病に診断した。

definition_en: A stage of proficiency or qualification in a course of study, now especially an award bestowed by a university or, in some countries, a college, as a certification of academic achievement. (In the United States, can include secondary schools.)
example: The new smartphone has a touch screen that recognizes each digit. / 新しいスマートフォンには各指が認識するタッチスクリーンがあります。

definition_en: In a digital manner.
meanings_ja: デジタル化されたに (for digital representation of data)
example: The company operates digitally, with all transactions processed online. / その会社はオンラインで電子的に運営しています。

definition_en: A single aspect of a given thing.
example: The company's financial dimension expanded rapidly. / その企業の財務的な次元は急速に拡大した。

definition_en: Any object that is designed to be disposed of rather than refilled or repaired.
meanings_ja: 使用後捨てられるもの
example: The company will no longer provide disposable cups. / その会社はもう使用後捨てられるカップを提供しない。

definition_en: To throw into confusion or disorder.
example: The meeting was disrupted by a sudden power outage. / 会議は急に停電によってがらんとしていた。

definition_en: That which distinguishes; a single occurrence of a determining factor or feature, the fact of being divided; separation, discrimination.
meanings_ja: 批評の高い評価 (in academic or artistic contexts)
example: The company's innovative product received great distinction in the industry. / その企業の新しい製品は業界で大きな賞を受けた。

definition_en: That which distinguishes; a single occurrence of a determining factor or feature, the fact of being divided; separation, discrimination.
example: The company makes distinctions between high-quality and low-quality products. / その会社は高品質と低品質の製品を区別しています。

definition_en: Something that distracts.
example: My concentration was broken by a sudden distraction, and I forgot what I was doing. / 私の集中力は突然の余興で途中止まり、我が目的を忘れてしまった。

definition_en: An act of distributing or state of being distributed.
example: The company's distribution of products was successful. / その会社の製品の配布は成功した。

definition_en: Consisting of many different elements; various.
example: The company values diversity in its workforce. / コーポレーションは、従業員層に多様性を尊ぶ。

definition_en: The chief magistrate in the republics of Venice and Genoa.
meanings_ja: インターネット上の有名な「Shibe」キャラクター
example: The Doge was a famous politician. / そのドゲは有名な政治家でした。

meanings_ja: ドック (a dock, a ship's docking place)
ドージ (a doze, a short sleep)
example: The boat was moored at the dock. / ボートはドックに係留されました。
The new policy is dollarbacked, ensuring its effectiveness. / 新しいポリシーは、実効性のあるものに支えられています。

definition_en: A geographic area owned or controlled by a single person or organization.
meanings_ja: 分野 (複数の分野)、領域 (特にインターネット上でのもの)
example: The company has several domains in the IT industry. / その会社はIT業界で複数の名前空間を持つ。

definition_en: A house servant; a maid; a household worker.
example: The domestic airline offers convenient flights to major cities. / 国内航空会社は主要都市への便を提供しています。

definition_en: The state of being dominant; of prime importance; supremacy.
example: The dominance of a particular language in a region affects its culture. / その地方の文化に特定の言語の支配権が影響する。

definition_en: The fifth major tone of a musical scale (five major steps above the note in question); thus G is the dominant of C, A of D, and so on.
example: The dominant gene was passed down to her children. / 彼女の子供たちにはその主要な遺伝子が受け継がれた。

definition_en: To make a donation; to give away something of value to support or contribute towards a cause or for the benefit of another.
meanings_ja: 自然資源の寄託 (for environmental donations)
example: The company is donating money to the disaster relief efforts. / その会社は災害復興基金に金銭を寄付しています。

definition_en: An outside step leading up to the door of a building, usually a home.
example: The charity worker knocked on every doorstep in the neighborhood to raise awareness. / 地区中の全ての屋根下で、チャリティー・ワーカーが啓発活動を実行した。

definition_en: A disadvantageous aspect of something that is normally advantageous.
example: The company's downsides include high labor costs and environmental concerns. / その会社の不利点として高労働費用と環境問題がある。

definition_en: A current of air, usually coming into a room or vehicle.
example: I need to review the draft of this report. / 私はこのレポートのドリフトを-reviewする必要があります。

definition_en: To write a first version, make a preliminary sketch.
example: The company drafted a young engineer to work on the new project. / その会社は新プロジェクトで若いエンジニアを選抜した。

definition_en: In a dramatic manner.
example: The play ended dramatically with the actor's death. / 舞台は俳優の死にきわどく幕を閉じた。

definition_en: Short private road that leads to a house or garage.
example: The driveway was long and winding. / 車道は長く曲がりくねっていた。

definition_en: Of an item that is one of a pair, the other item in the pair.
meanings_ja: 両立派の (in the context of dual citizenship)
example: The company has a dual structure, with separate teams for product development and marketing. / その会社には、製品開発とマーケティング両方のチームがある。

definition_en: (manner) In an economical manner; not wastefully; not extravagantly
example: The new policy will be implemented economically. / 新しい政策は、予算的に実施されます。

definition_en: The extent to which time is well used for the intended task.
example: The new manufacturing process improved efficiency, reducing production time by half. / 新しい製造工程により、生産時間が半減になりました。

definition_en: In an efficient manner.
example: The company is working efficiently to meet the deadline. / 社会は期限を優秀に遵守しています。

meanings_ja: アメリカ合衆国第34代大統領
(軍人) - World War IIでの指揮官
example: Dwight D. Eisenhower was the President of the United States from 1953 to 1961. / アメリカ合衆国大統領を1953年から1961年まで務めた。

definition_en: A tradesman who installs, repairs and maintains electrical wiring and equipment.
meanings_ja: 電気技師 (for more technical or specialized contexts)
example: The electricians installed new wiring in our house. / 我々の家に新しい配線を設置した電気工です。

meanings_ja: エロン・ミュースター
example: Elon is a famous entrepreneur. / エロンは有名な起業家です。

definition_en: To make somebody able (to do, or to be, something); to give sufficient ability or power to do or to be; to give strength or ability to.
example: The new software was enabled for all users. / 新ソフトウェアは全員に有効化されました。

definition_en: The act of enforcing; compulsion.
example: The government is increasing enforcement of traffic laws to reduce accidents. / 交通法の強制執行を増やすことで、事故数を減らすよう政府は努めている。

definition_en: (heading) To interact socially.
example: The movie was engaging and kept me on the edge of my seat. / 映画はやり玉で、私を座席の端に座らせた。

definition_en: A company, business, organization, or other purposeful endeavor.
example: The enterprise was established to improve people's lives. / 新しいビジネスを設立し、人々の人生を改善することを目指す。

definition_en: That which has a distinct existence as an individual unit. Often used for organisations which have no physical form.
example: The companies are major entities in the industry. / その企業は業界の主要個体です。

definition_en: That which has a distinct existence as an individual unit. Often used for organisations which have no physical form.
example: The company is a major entity in the industry. / その会社は業界で大きな個体です。

definition_en: Anything that is virtually equal to something else, or has the same value, force, etc.
example: The cost of the product is equivalent to a year's salary. / その商品の価格は一年の給与と等価です。

meanings_ja: 逐次増加する (for gradual increase)
example: The company's profits are everincreasing, thanks to their innovative products. / その会社の利益は、創造的な製品のおかげで増加している。

definition_en: An exception, or something having an exceptional value
example: This company is exceptional in its customer service. / この会社の顧客サービスは非常に優れている。

definition_en: An act of exchanging or trading.
example: The company has several exchanges with suppliers. / その会社は複数の取引を行っています。

definition_en: To change (something) from a smaller form and/or size to a larger one; to spread out or lay open.
example: The company is expanding into new markets. / 会社は新しい市場に展開しています。

definition_en: The act or process of expanding.
example: The company's expansion into new markets led to significant growth. / 会社の新しい市場への拡大は著しい成長をもたらした。

definition_en: Great skill or knowledge in a particular field or hobby.
example: The company values employees' expertise in product development. / その会社は製品開発における従業員の専門知識を評価しています。

definition_en: One who, or that which, exports: especially a person who or organization that exports or sells goods made in one country for delivery in another country.
meanings_ja: 輸出品業者 (secondary meaning, referring to companies or organizations that engage in exporting)
example: The company was a major exporter of electronics. / その会社は電子的輸出品企業でした。

definition_en: A law-enforcement official of the FBI; a federal agent.
example: The United States is a federal republic. / アメリカ合衆国は連邦共和国です。
The Federman was responsible for ensuring the safety of all aircraft. / 航空官は、すべての航空機の安全を確保する責任を持つ。

definition_en: A single elongated piece of a given material, roughly round in cross-section, often twisted with other fibers to form thread.
example: The doctor examined the patient's fiber count to diagnose anemia. / 安イ化診断のために医師は患者さんの細胞質カウントを検査した。

definition_en: To make final or firm; to finish or complete.

definition_en: To set (something, often a building) on fire.

definition_en: To throw so as to turn over.

definition_en: Forward in time, place or degree.

definition_en: A whole number that can be divided by another number with no remainder.

definition_en: To plan, control and record the position and course of a vehicle, ship, aircraft, etc., on a journey; to follow a planned course.

definition_en: In a negative manner; so as to be damaging or not positive.

definition_en: To confer with others in order to come to terms or reach an agreement.

definition_en: To confer with others in order to come to terms or reach an agreement.

definition_en: To confer with others in order to come to terms or reach an agreement.

meanings_ja: コンピュータと神経系を接続する技術

definition_en: A small cut in a surface.

definition_en: To name someone as a candidate for a particular role or position, including that of an office.

meanings_ja: グラフィックチップメーカー

definition_en: A material object that physically exists.

definition_en: To relocate production, services or jobs to lower-cost locations in the same country.

meanings_ja: オープンソースの人工知能プラットフォーム

definition_en: An elongated round shape resembling an egg or ellipse.

definition_en: One who participates.

definition_en: To join as a partner.

definition_en: The state of being associated with a partner.

definition_en: A footpath or other path or track.

meanings_ja: 位置調整（per au）-航空用語で、離陸や着陸の準備を指す。

meanings_ja: Pittsburghはアメリカ合衆国ペンシルベニア州の都市です

example: I'm going to visit my friend in Pittsburgh. / ピッツバーグに友達が住んでいて行く。

definition_en: One of the tiny dots that make up the representation of an image in a computer's memory.

definition_en: The pipes, together with the joints, tanks, stopcocks, taps and other fixtures of a water, gas or sewage system in a house or other building.

definition_en: A seed case for legumes (e.g. peas, beans, peppers); a seedpod.

definition_en: An audio programme produced on a regular basis, delivered over the Internet in a compressed digital format and designed for playback on computers or portable digital audio players, such as the iPod.

definition_en: Polytechnic.

definition_en: (usually as a form of address) Father, dad.

definition_en: An allocated amount.

meanings_ja: パウエル（人名） - Powell can refer to a person, particularly Joseph Powell or Lewellyn F. Powell.

definition_en: A primary election; a preliminary election to select a political candidate of a political party.

definition_en: To arrange or list a group of things in order of priority or importance.

definition_en: To move, pass, or go forward or onward; to advance; to carry on

definition_en: The state of being productive, fertile or efficient

definition_en: The deep; the sea; the ocean.

definition_en: An advantage of something, especially when contrasted with its disadvantages (cons).

definition_en: One who, or that which, provides a service, commodity, or the means for subsistence.

definition_en: One who, or that which, provides a service, commodity, or the means for subsistence.

definition_en: Directly related, connected, or pertinent to a topic.

definition_en: To keep back; to retain.

definition_en: The income returned by an investment.

meanings_ja: リカルド (Ricardo) - 19世紀のイギリス経済学者

definition_en: In a right manner, correctly, justifiably.

definition_en: The transportation of goods.
example: The company handles shipping of goods from Japan to Europe. / その会社は日本から欧州に向けた物流を担当しています。

definition_en: A footpath near a road.
example: The car hit me sideways while I was crossing the street. / 私が通り道を横断する際、車が私に向かって来ました。

definition_en: To register visually.
meanings_ja: 能力を具備している (in this sense, "sighted" means having a particular ability or talent)
example: The new employee was sighted to be very skilled in his field. / この新員は、その分野で非常に才能が高いと評価されました。

definition_en: In a significant manner or to a significant extent.
meanings_ja: 確かに、実際に (to a great extent, in reality)
example: The new policy will significantly affect the company's profits. / その新しいポリシーは会社の利益に大きく影響します。

definition_en: A nonmetallic element (symbol Si) with an atomic number of 14 and atomic weight of 28.0855.
example: The computer contains silicon as a major component. / コンピューターはソフトウェアの主要な成分としてsiliconを含む。

definition_en: The state or quality of being simple
example: The designer aimed for simplicity in the new product design. / 新製品デザインでシンプルさを目指す。

definition_en: Possessing skill.
example: She's a skillful designer, making beautiful clothes. / 彼女は美しい服を製作することで、才能のあるデザイナーです。

definition_en: The main bones of the head considered as a unit; including the cranium, facial bones, and mandible.
example: The skull was cracked in two. / 頭蓋骨は二つに割れた。

definition_en: To make (something) run, move, etc. less quickly; to reduce the speed of.
example: The traffic on the highway started slowing down as we approached the city. / 市内近郊に到達した時、高速道路の交通はスロウダウンになりました。

definition_en: To make less natural or innocent.
example: The company's sophisticated computer system made it easy to analyze data. / 会社の高度に洗練されたコンピューター・システムを介してデータの分析が容易になった。

definition_en: To separate items into different categories according to certain criteria that determine their sorts.
example: The files were sorted by category. / ファイルはカテゴリで順序整列されました。

definition_en: To obtain or procure: used especially of a business resource.
meanings_ja: 元を探し出す（to find the origin of）
example: The company sourced high-quality components from local suppliers. / その会社は地方の卸売りから高品質の部品を調達した。

definition_en: A range; a continuous, infinite, one-dimensional set, possibly bounded by extremes.
meanings_ja: 分布範囲 (mathematical or statistical context)
example: The spectrum of the rainbow is visible to the naked eye. / 虹のスペクトルは裸眼で観察可能です。

definition_en: To rotate, revolve, gyrate (usually quickly); to partially or completely rotate to face another direction.
example: The company is spinning a new product line. / その会社は新しい製品ラインを展開しています。

definition_en: A sheet of paper, marked with a grid, in which financial data is recorded and totals calculated manually.
meanings_ja: (広がった表) - this refers to the act of spreading out a table or chart on a surface
example: I need to make a budget using a spreadsheet. / 予算を表計算書で作る必要があります。

definition_en: To beat or press into pulp or a flat mass; to crush.
meanings_ja: 打ち潰された (in a physical sense, e.g. a bug being squashed)
example: The ripe tomato was squashed on the road. / 道路でripeのトマトが圧縮された。

definition_en: An act of stabbing or thrusting with an object.
example: The attacker made a quick stab at the opponent. / 攻撃者は相手に対して速やかに打撃した。

definition_en: The condition of being stable or in equilibrium, and thus resistant to change.
meanings_ja: 安心感 (if referring to emotional or psychological stability)
example: The team's stability allowed them to achieve success. / チームの安定性により、彼らは成功を実現した。

definition_en: A cryptocurrency with price stability by design.
example: The stablecoin was designed to maintain a stable value despite market fluctuations. / 価格安定化貨幣は、市場の変動にも関わらず価格を安定化するために設計された。

definition_en: A piece of wood or other material, usually long and slender, pointed at one end so as to be easily driven into the ground as a marker or a support or stay.
meanings_ja: 評価や評判の基礎、理由
example: The company will stake its reputation on this new product. / その新製品に会社の評判をかける。

definition_en: The act or process of starting a process or machine.
example: We're a startup that creates innovative apps. / 私たちはイノベーティブなアプリケーションを作成する新規企業です。

definition_en: The act or process of starting a process or machine.
example: Silicon Valley is known for its many successful startups. / シリコンバレーは、多くの成功した新規事業に知られいます。

definition_en: To encourage into action.
example: The new policy aims to stimulate economic growth. / 新しい政策は経済の成長を推進する。

definition_en: A pushing or goading toward action.
example: The new employee needed some stimulation after a long winter break. / 新しい従業員は、長い冬休み後の激励を必要としました。

definition_en: Of or pertaining to strategy
meanings_ja: tatakatte iru (meaning "to take advantage of an opportunity" or "to gain an edge")
senryaku-teki (meaning "related to strategy" or "having a strategic goal")
example: Our company's new marketing campaign is very strategic. / その会社の新しいマーケティングキャンペーンは非常にistratēkkuです。

definition_en: Stubbornness.
example: He's being very stubborn about buying a new car. / 彼は新しい車を買うのを非常に頽む。

definition_en: A committee formed by an existing committee, comprising a subset of its members.
example: The company set up a subcommittee to investigate the new market trend. / 会社は、新しい市場趨勢を調べるために小委員会を設置した。

definition_en: (construed with to) To cause (someone or something) to undergo a particular experience, especially one that is unpleasant or unwanted.
meanings_ja: 強制された (in a negative sense)
example: The company's employees were subjected to harsh working conditions. / その会社の社員は厳しい労働環境に晒されていた。

definition_en: Anything having substance; an essential part.
example: The company has a substantial presence in Asia. / その会社はアジアでの実態が大きい。

definition_en: In a strong substantial manner; considerably.
example: The new policy will substantially affect our business. / 新しい政策は大きく我々のビジネスに影響を与える。

definition_en: A person or thing that immediately follows another in holding an office or title.
meanings_ja: 次代の人物 (for a person who takes over someone's position or responsibility)
example: The company's successor, John, took over as CEO last year. / その後継者ジョンは去年CEOに就任しました。

definition_en: A peak; the topmost point or surface, as of a mountain.
example: The company held a summit meeting with investors to discuss the future of the business. / その会社は投資家との最高の会合で将来のビジネスについて話し合った。

definition_en: Providing support.
example: She was very supportive of her friend during a tough time. / 彼女は友人に対して大変なときに非常に助けの心を持った。

definition_en: To exchange or give (something) in an exchange (for something else).
example: I'll swap my old phone with a new one. / 私は古い携帯電話を新しいものと交換します。

definition_en: A device for grasping an object and an attached means of moving it, as a rope and hook.
example: I need to tackle this difficult project. / この困難なプロジェクトを取り組む必要があります。

definition_en: The act of imposing taxes and the fact of being taxed.
meanings_ja: 公共サービスに対する負担
example: The country is increasing taxation to fund its infrastructure projects. / その国はインフラプロジェクトを支援するため、税金を増加させる。

definition_en: To rend (a solid material) by holding or restraining in two places and pulling apart, whether intentionally or not; to destroy or separate.
meanings_ja: すきに割れる (for physical tearing, e.g. a piece of cloth)
example: The child's eyes were tearing up as she watched her favorite TV show get cancelled. / その子供の目は、自分の好きなテレビ番組が打ち切りになったのを見て泣いていた。

definition_en: The condition of being held in a state between two or more forces, which are acting in opposition to each other.
example: The team was under great tension before the game. / ゲーム前のチームは大きなストレスにありました。

definition_en: The process of terminating or the state of being terminated.
example: The company's termination of my contract was unfair. / 会社の私の契約終了は公平ではなかった。

definition_en: Of or relating to theory; abstract; not empirical.
example: Theoretical physics is a fascinating field. / 理論物理学は面白い分野です。

definition_en: In theory; on paper
meanings_ja: 側面的に (in a hypothetical sense)
example: The new policy is theoretically sound, but its practicality is uncertain. / 新しい政策は理論上は正しいが実際的には不明である。
The actor's performance was impressive, but his costume in the thesar distracted from his acting. / 彼の演技は印象的であったが、舞台裏の装飾が彼のアクトリングに影響を与えた。

definition_en: A syllable used in solfège to represent the seventh note of a major scale.
example: I'm going to have a cup of ti. / 私はティーをいただきます。

definition_en: To make a clicking noise similar to the movement of the hands in an analog clock.
meanings_ja: 机に印を付ける (in a mechanical or electronic device)
example: I was really ticked off when they cancelled my flight. / 私は、彼らが私の飛行機をキャンセルしたことを非常に不満に思った。

definition_en: Something serving as an expression of something else.
meanings_ja: 支払い証明 (in computing and finance)
example: The museum gave us a token to enter the special exhibit. / 博物館は特別展示の入場にトークンを配した。

definition_en: Something serving as an expression of something else.
example: The company uses tokens to track employee hours. / その会社は従業員の時間をトークンで追跡します。

meanings_ja: アナウンサー (in some contexts)

definition_en: Strong and resilient; sturdy.
example: The toughest challenge was climbing Mount Everest. / EVEREST登頂は一番困難な挑戦であった。

definition_en: Buying and selling of goods and services on a market.
meanings_ja: 交換（例えば資産の取引）

definition_en: To do, carry through, conduct or perform some action.
meanings_ja: 実行する (business transactions), 交渉する (to negotiate)

definition_en: The process of change from one form, state, style or place to another.
meanings_ja: 交替, 輪替え (these two meanings refer to a change or replacement in position, role, etc.)

definition_en: A place where treasure is stored safely.
example: The ancient city was said to have hidden its treasuries deep within the temple complex. / 古い都市は、寺院Complexの深くに財宝を隠したと言われていた。

definition_en: A place where treasure is stored safely.
example: The government's treasury department is responsible for managing the country's finances. / 政府の財務省は国の財政を管理する責任があります。

definition_en: Any of various rotary machines that use the kinetic energy of a continuous stream of fluid (a liquid or a gas) to turn a shaft.

definition_en: The sound of a bird; any short high-pitched sound or whistle.

meanings_ja: タクシー・ハイヤー・サービス

definition_en: The most basic or fundamental of a set of things

definition_en: To improve, usually applied to technology, generally by complete replacement of one or more components

meanings_ja: ヴィンレス (Vinyl-like) - referring to something resembling vinyl material
ヴィーモー (Vinmo) - possibly a brand name or specific term in certain industries

meanings_ja: ネットワーク上の仮想的な
ヴィジュアルな、描像的な

definition_en: The condition of being visible.

meanings_ja: ヴィーガンの生活方式

meanings_ja: ファルス (Walshは姓でもあり、ファルス姓を指すことがある)
森の壁（Walshは、数学分野で用いられる Walsh積分などの意味がある）

definition_en: The system of burrows where rabbits live.

ウェスティングハウスの名前を冠した企業（くにぎょう）

definition_en: In a wild, uncontrolled manner.

definition_en: In or to the front; in advance; onward.

definition_en: To grant, give, admit, accord, afford, or yield; to let one have.

definition_en: Something or someone that doesn't quite make it.

example: The ancient city was hidden deep in the jungle. / 将軍は古い都市を探しに出かけた。

結果としては問題ない、そんなもの

definition_en: To be grateful or thankful for.

definition_en: A measure of the extent of a surface; it is measured in square units.

definition_en: A measure of the extent of a surface; it is measured in square units.

definition_en: One's social heritage, or previous life; what one did in the past.

definition_en: A person who bakes and sells bread, cakes and similar items.
example: The baker sells fresh bread every morning. / パン屋は毎朝新鮮なパンを販売します。

definition_en: An institution where one can place and borrow money and take care of financial affairs.

definition_en: To give as its foundation or starting point; to lay the foundation of.
meanings_ja: 標準に基づく (mainly referring to logical or theoretical basis)

definition_en: A necessary commodity, a staple requirement.

ボストンチーム（プロスポーツチーム、特にMLB）

definition_en: (money) A piece of currency, usually metallic and in the shape of a disc, but sometimes polygonal, or with a hole in the middle.

I'm going to com with my friend online. / 私はインターネットで友達と通話します。

meanings_ja: キュリーン (a given name, a feminine personal name)

創造的発見 - (creative insights or discoveries)

ファンブルーやライトウェイトボクシングなどのスポーツでの熱心な支持者

meanings_ja: 将に (~に) - This meaning is often used in informal contexts, such as texting or social media.

definition_en: The forces or behaviours that are the enemy of evil. Usually consists of helping others and general benevolence.

definition_en: Very elevated; extending or being far above a base; tall; lofty.

definition_en: To adorn or grace; to honour; to make becoming, appropriate, or honourable.

definition_en: Very large.

Note: As a dictionary, I can provide multiple meanings for the word "huge" if there are multiple relevant translations in Japanese.

definition_en: A human being, whether man, woman or child.

meanings_ja:
I'm a Japanese-English dictionary. Here are the results:

meaning: 作成
example: I'm making a new video game. / 私は新しいビデオゲームを作成しています。

Note: This is one of the most common meanings of "making", which refers to creating or producing something.

Other possible meanings:
meaning: 成立 (to become established)
example: The company has been making progress in recent years. / 会社は最近幾年で進歩を成している。

meaning: 手作業 (to make by hand)
example: I'm making a handmade craft. / 私は手作りのアートを作成しています。

Please note that these are just some of the possible meanings, and "making" can have other connotations depending on the context in which it is used.

example: I need to organize my shelves before moving. / 私の書架を整理する必要があります。

definition_en: A loud burst of voice or voices; a violent and sudden outcry, especially that of a multitude expressing joy, triumph, exultation, anger, or animated courage.
example: "I'll shout 'Hello!' to get their attention." / 「彼らの注意を引くために『こんにちは』と叫ぶ」

definition_en: A bounding straight edge of a two-dimensional shape.
meanings_ja: (例えば、政治的・社会的な) 立場
example: The company's sides were not in sync with our values. / その会社の立場は我々の価値観と合わない。

definition_en: A lustrous, white, metallic element, atomic number 47, atomic weight 107.87, symbol Ag.
meanings_ja: 貴金属 (referring to silver as a precious metal)
example: The necklace was made of pure silver. / 銀色のネックレスは純銀製でした。

definition_en: That which is similar to, or resembles, something else, as in quality, form, etc.
meanings_ja: 類似する、共通点が多い
example: The two companies have similar goals. / 二社は同じ目標を持つ。

definition_en: From a specified time in the past.
example: I haven't seen her since high school. / 私は高校以来彼女を見ていません。

definition_en: A 45 RPM vinyl record with one song on side A and one on side B.
example: I'm a single person living alone. / 私は一人暮らしです。

definition_en: The combination of circumstances at a given moment; a state of affairs.
example: The situation is getting worse. /สถานシユーションは悪化しています。

definition_en: The combination of circumstances at a given moment; a state of affairs.
example: In this situation, I think it's best to apologize. / この状況では、謝罪した方がいいと思います。

definition_en: To set apart; separate.
example: Having good communication skills is important. / 善いコミュニケーション能力は大切です。

definition_en: Exhibiting social ability or cleverness.
example: She became smarter after reading many books. / 彼女は多くの本を読むことで知能が高くなった。

definition_en: A festive gathering to foster introductions.
meanings_ja: 社会的な, 集団的な
example: The social event was a great success. / ソーシャルイベントは大成功した。

definition_en: A long-standing group of people sharing cultural aspects such as language, dress, norms of behavior and artistic forms.
example: The company values diversity in society. / その会社は社会の多様性を尊ぶ。

definition_en: (chiefly law enforcement) A solution; an explanation.
example: I need to solve this math problem. / 私はこの数学問題を解決する必要があります。

definition_en: Unspecified or unknown (unlocated) place or location.
example: I'm going somewhere for my birthday. / 私の誕生日にはどこか行く。

definition_en: The state of moving quickly or the capacity for rapid motion; rapidity.
meanings_ja: 突っ張り、早い (this refers to the idea of picking up speed or increasing velocity)
example: The new engine will increase the speed of our car. / 新しいエンジンは、私たちの車の速度を上げます。

definition_en: To pay out (money).
example: I spent all my money on a new phone. / 私は新しい電話にすべての金を費やした。

definition_en: (plural staffs or staves) A long, straight, thick wooden rod or stick, especially one used to assist in walking.
meanings_ja: チームのメンバー (referring to a team or organization)
example: The hospital staff worked tirelessly to treat the injured patients. / 病院の職員は無尽蔵に負傷者を診ておりました。

definition_en: A phase.
meanings_ja: ステージ（演劇、コンサートなど）
example: The rock band will perform on stage tonight. / そのロックバンドは今夜ステージでパフォーマンスをします。

definition_en: To begin, commence, initiate.
example: I'm starting my new job next Monday. / 我は来週月曜日に新しい仕事を始める。

definition_en: A condition; a set of circumstances applying at any given time.
example: The state of California is known for its beautiful beaches. / カリフォルニア州は美しいビーチで知られます。

definition_en: A condition; a set of circumstances applying at any given time.
meanings_ja: 状態や状態を示すこと (e.g., physical or mental state)
example: Her emotional states were all over the map. / 彼女の感情状態はあちこちで揺れていた。

definition_en: A stopping place.
meanings_ja: 路線区間 (in a broader sense)
example: The train stations in Tokyo are very busy. / 東京の鉄道駅は非常に賑わしい。

definition_en: To prop; support; sustain; hold up; steady.
example: I stayed at my friend's house for a week. / 私は友人の家に週間滞在しました。

definition_en: To move the foot in walking; to advance or recede by raising and moving one of the feet to another resting place, or by moving both feet in succession.
meanings_ja: 一歩留まっている (in a position)
example: She stepped back from the edge and looked down. / 彼女は縁辺から一歩戻り、下を見た。

definition_en: An advance or movement made from one foot to the other; a pace.
example: The company will take steps to reduce carbon emissions. / その会社は炭素排gasを削減するために手順を講じる。

definition_en: Capable of producing great physical force.
example: The company's new policy made them stronger. / その会社の新しい政策で彼らはより強くなりました。

definition_en: An academic field of study concerning the given subject.
example: The company conducts studies to improve their products. / その会社は製品を改良するために調査を実施しています。

definition_en: Miscellaneous items or objects; (with possessive) personal effects.
meanings_ja: 乾物 (in a sense of trash or waste)
example: The store sells all sorts of stuff, from clothes to electronics. / その店は、服から電化製品までの全種類の物事を売ります。

definition_en: A stupid person; a fool.
example: He's too stupid to solve this puzzle. / 彼はこのパズルの解決にはあまりに愚かしい。

definition_en: To follow in order; to come next after; hence, to take the place of.
example: I worked hard and finally succeeded in my project. / 私は努力してプロジェクトに成功した。

definition_en: The achievement of one's aim or goal.
example: I worked hard to achieve success in my career. / 私は私のキャリアでの成功を目指して努力した。

definition_en: An unexpected occurrence; a surprise.
example: The earthquake struck without warning, causing widespread damage. / 地震は突然、広範囲の被害を与えた。

definition_en: A quantity obtained by addition or aggregation.
meanings_ja: まとめ (to summarize or sum up) - this meaning is less common, but still exists in certain contexts.
example: What's the sum of 2+2? / 2+2の合計は何ですか?

definition_en: (sometimes attributive) Something which supports.
meanings_ja: 質Backing (for a person or an idea)
example: The company will support your project financially. / その会社はあなたのプロジェクトを財政的に支える。

definition_en: A collection of organized things; a whole composed of relationships among its members.
example: The company has a system to track employee performance. / 会社は従業員のパフォーマンスを追跡するシステムを持つ。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 取引中にある (in a business deal)
example: I've taken a break to relax. / 私は休みを取り上げてリラックスしています。

definition_en: To get into one's hands, possession or control, with or without force.
meanings_ja: 取り組む (in a professional or academic sense)
example: I'm taking a break from my studies. / 学習を休み中です。

definition_en: A piece of work done as part of one’s duties.
example: I have a task to finish by the end of the day. / 今晩までに仕事を完了する必要があります。

definition_en: A piece of work done as part of one’s duties.
example: I have many tasks to finish today. / 今日は多くの手作業がある。

definition_en: The organization of knowledge for practical purposes.
meanings_ja: ハードウェアやソフトウェアの総称
example: The company invested heavily in technology to improve its products. / その会社は製品を改善するため、科学技術に大きな投資をした。

definition_en: That which limits the extent of anything; limit, extremity, bound, boundary.
example: The term of the contract is one year. / 契約の期限は1年です。

definition_en: For that or this purpose, referring to something previously stated.
example: I worked hard therefore I got the job. / 僕は努力したため、ジョブを得ました。

definition_en: Form created in the mind, rather than the forms perceived through the five senses; an instance of thinking.
example: She spent hours thinking about her thoughts. / 彼女はhours考えて自分の考え事について話した。

meanings_ja: 複数の (in a numerical context, e.g. "the thousands of people...")
example: Thousands of people attended the concert. / 数千人の人々がコンサートに参加した。
The company has a tight deadline to finish the project. / コングリナルにはプロジェクトの期限が厳しいです。

definition_en: A mechanical device intended to make a task easier.
meanings_ja: ツール (general meaning, referring to a device or instrument used for a specific purpose)
技術的な道具 (referring to software or hardware tools used in technical work)
手段 (referring to a means or method used to achieve something)
example: The tool box contains many useful tools. / ツールボックスには、たくさんの有用なツールがあります。
My favorite singer is Tracy Chapman. / トレーシー・チャップマンが好きです。

definition_en: To be on a journey, often for pleasure or business and with luggage; to go from one place to another.
example: I've been traveling around Japan for a month. / 私は日本を1ヶ月間旅行してきた。

definition_en: To attempt; to endeavour. Followed by infinitive.
example: I'm trying to learn this new language. /私はこの新しい言語を学習しています。

definition_en: (heading) to make a non-linear physical movement.
example: The road turns left at the next intersection. / 最初の交差点で左に曲がる。

definition_en: A grouping based on shared characteristics; a class.
example: This software supports multiple types of files. / このソフトウェアは複数のファイル種類をサポートします。

definition_en: An occurrence of the interjection "uh".
meanings_ja: 疑問のための言葉 (e.g. "Uh, what time is it?")
example: "I'm not sure." / "うまくないですね。"

definition_en: To grasp a concept fully and thoroughly, especially (of words, statements, art, etc.) to be aware of the meaning of and (of people) to be aware of the intent of.
meanings_ja: 認識している (in a more formal or academic sense)
example: She understands what I mean. / 彼女は私の意味を理解する。

definition_en: Up to the time of (something happening).
example: I'll study until midnight. / 私は深夜12時まで勉強する。

definition_en: Having a practical or beneficial use.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help! 😊

meaning 1: 使いみちのある

This is the most common meaning of "useful", referring to something that has a practical or helpful purpose.

example: The new smartphone is useful for taking pictures. / 新しいスマートフォンは写真を撮るために使いみちがあります。

meaning 2 (optional): 価値のある

This additional meaning refers to something that has value or worth, not necessarily in a practical sense but rather in terms of its cultural or social significance.

example: The ancient temple is useful as a symbol of the country's history. / 旧寺は国の歴史的遺産としての意味で価値があります。

Note that this additional meaning is not as common as the first one, but it's still an important aspect of the word "useful" in certain contexts.

definition_en: The act of using.
example: The new software uses artificial intelligence to analyze data. / 新しいソフトウェアは人工知能を使用してデータを分析します。

definition_en: To utilize or employ.
example: I'm using my phone to check the weather. / 私は携帯電話をみて天気をチェックしています。

definition_en: An elongated depression between hills or mountains, often with a river flowing through it.
meanings_ja: 峡谷 (for a deep and narrow valley)
example: The hikers followed the trail through the valley. / わたしたちは峡谷を歩いて行きました。

definition_en: The quality (positive or negative) that renders something desirable or valuable.
example: What do you value most in life? / 人生で最も優先することは何ですか？
I visited Vietnam last year. / 私は去年ベトナムに旅行した。

definition_en: (physical) Visual perception.
meanings_ja: 評価、見解 (視点や態度を示す場合)
example: The new employee has a great view of the city from his office window. / 彼のオフィスウィンドウからは市景が非常にいい見晴りです。

definition_en: A formalized choice on matters of administration or other democratic activities
example: The election will be won by whoever gets the most votes. / 運命の投票を勝つのは、最多得票者である。

definition_en: A small case, often flat and often made of leather, for keeping money (especially paper money), credit cards, etc.
example: I lost my wallet and couldn't find it anywhere. / 私の財布を失ってしまったし、どこにも見つからない。

definition_en: Organized, large-scale, armed conflict between countries or between national, ethnic, or other sizeable groups, usually involving the engagement of military forces.
meanings_ja: 憲兵闘争 (if referring to civil wars)
example: The world has seen many wars throughout history. / 世史を通じて多くの軍事衝突があった。

meanings_ja: ジョージ・ワシントン (referring to George Washington, the first President of the United States)
example: The capital of the United States is Washington. / アメリカ合衆国の首都はワシントンです。

definition_en: Lacking in force (usually strength) or ability.
meanings_ja: 樹脂的、軟弱の (in a physical or emotional sense)
example: The weak player couldn't win the game. / その弱いプレイヤーはゲームを勝ち合わせることができなかった。

definition_en: The World Wide Web.
example: The web of intrigue was hard to unravel. / その陰謀の網は解くことが困難だった。

definition_en: One of the four principal compass points, specifically 270°, conventionally directed to the left on maps; the direction of the setting sun at an equinox, abbreviated as W.
meanings_ja: アメリカ大陸 (mainly referring to the Western United States)
example: The sun sets in the west. / 西に向かって日が沈む。

definition_en: Unexceptional or unimportant; blah.
meanings_ja: 何に対しても、どのような
example: I'll do whatever you say. / 私はあなたが言うようにする。

definition_en: Which of two.
example: I'm not sure whether to go or stay. / 私は行くか留まるか決めるのを疑問に思う。

definition_en: An uncertain duration of time, a period of time.
example: I'll study while you're working. / 僕は君が仕事している間に勉強します。

definition_en: Something complete, without any parts missing.
example: The whole company is involved in this project. / その会社がこのプロジェクトに全面的に参加している。

meanings_ja: スポーツチームの名称（例えば、ウィルソン・コーヒーで有名なNBAチーム）
example: The Williams sisters won the tennis tournament. / ウィリアムズ姉妹がテニストーナメントを勝ちました。

definition_en: One who has won or often wins.
example: The winner of the marathon was a young woman from Japan. / マラソンの優勝者は、日本の若い女性だった。

definition_en: To conquer, defeat.
example: She wins the competition./彼女は競争を勝ちました

definition_en: Outside, externally. This is still used in the names of some civil parishes in England, e.g. St Cuthbert Without.
example: I'll go to the party without my friends. / 私は友達なしでパーティーに行く。

definition_en: (heading) Employment.
meanings_ja: 作業、労働 (in a business or industrial context)
example: The company's new works in progress are expected to boost productivity. / その会社の新しい進捗中の作業は生産性を上昇させることが期待されています。

definition_en: Thinking about unpleasant things that have happened or that might happen; feeling afraid and unhappy.
example: I've been worried about my exams. / 私の試験について苦心している。

definition_en: A strong feeling of anxiety.
meanings_ja: 失意の心を傷つけること
example: I'm worried about the exam. / 私は試験に心配している。

definition_en: Value.
example: This new smartphone is worth $500. / この新型スマートフォンは5万円です。

definition_en: (usually with negative) Thus far; up to the present; up to some specified time; still
example: I'll finish this project yet. / これを最後に済ますが、まだ時間がある。

definition_en: To bowl a yorker at a batsman, especially to get a batsman out in this way.
example: I'm going to visit New York next year. / 今年の年末にはニューヨークを訪ねます。

definition_en: A way or means of approaching or entering; an entrance; a passage.
meanings_ja: アクセス（インターネット等のアクセス）
example: The new highway provides access to the city. / 新しい高速道路は、市街にアクセスを提供しています。

definition_en: To finish successfully.
example: I will accomplish my goal this year. /今年の目標を達成する。

definition_en: One who renders account; one accountable.
meanings_ja: 書記係 (in a corporate or organizational context)
example: The company hired an accountant to manage their finances. / 会社は財務を管理するために会計士を雇用した。

definition_en: The act of achieving or performing; a successful performance; accomplishment
example: She worked hard and achieved great success in her career. / 彼女は努力して、彼女のキャリアで偉大な成功を実現した。

definition_en: Something added.
example: I need additional resources to complete this project. / これらのプロジェクトを完了するためには追加のリソースが必要です。

definition_en: To prepare oneself.
example: The company addressed the employee's concerns. / 会社は従業員の心配に取り組んだ。

definition_en: A forward move; improvement or progression.
meanings_ja: 支払い (in the sense of "to pay in advance")
example: The company is making great advances in artificial intelligence. / 会社は人工intelligenceで大きく進歩しています。

definition_en: Any condition, circumstance, opportunity or means, particularly favorable to success, or to any desired end.
example: He took advantage of the opportunity to promote his business. / 彼は商売を推進する機会に優位した。

definition_en: The capacity, condition, or state of acting or of exerting power.
example: The travel agency helped us book our flight. /旅行代理店は、私たちの飛行機の予約を助けました。

definition_en: One who exerts power, or has the power to act
example: The travel agent booked our flight. / 旅行代理人が我々の飛行機を予約した。

definition_en: One who exerts power, or has the power to act
example: The real estate agents helped us find our dream home. / 我々の夢の家を見つけるために、不動産中間者たちが助けました。

definition_en: An understanding between entities to follow a specific course of conduct.
meanings_ja: 合意, 協定 (for a formal agreement or treaty)
example: We reached an agreement on the terms. / その条項について合意を達した。

definition_en: Help; assistance; succor, relief.
example: The charity organization provided aid to the disaster-stricken area. / 災害区域にチャリティー組織が助けを提供した。

definition_en: To point or direct a missile, or a weapon which propels as missile, towards an object or spot with the intent of hitting it
example: The company aimed to increase sales by 20%. / その会社は、20%の増加を目指していた。

definition_en: The pointing of a weapon, as a gun, a dart, or an arrow, or object, in the line of direction with the object intended to be struck; the line of fire; the direction of anything, such as a spear, a blow, a discourse, a remark, towards a particular point or object, with a view to strike or affect it.
example: What are your aims in life? / 何が人生の目的ですか?

definition_en: A wing of a building, notably in a church separated from the nave proper by piers.
example: The passengers boarded through the aisle of the plane. / 乗客たちは、飛行機の廊で乗船しました。

definition_en: To grant, give, admit, accord, afford, or yield; to let one have.
example: The new policy allows employees to work from home one day a week. / 新しいポリシーにより、週に1日はホームワークが許可される。

definition_en: A situation which allows a mutually exclusive choice between two or more possibilities; a choice between two or more possibilities.
example: I'm considering alternative energy sources. / 私は代替エネルギーの選択を検討しています。

definition_en: A tall, strong, athletic woman.
meanings_ja: オンラインの通販サイト
アマゾン川（南アメリカ）
example: I love shopping on Amazon. / アマゾンで買い物が大好きです。

definition_en: The total, aggregate or sum of material (not applicable to discrete numbers or units or items in standard English).
example: The amounts of money donated to the charity exceeded expectations. / チャリティーに寄付された金額は期待を超えた。

definition_en: To give public notice, especially for the first time; to make known
example: We're going to announce the new policy at the meeting. / 会議で新しい政策を公表します。

definition_en: To give public notice, especially for the first time; to make known
example: The company announced its new product line yesterday. / 会社は昨日新製品ラインを公式に発表した。

definition_en: An act of announcing, or giving notice.
example: The company will make announcements about new products soon. / その会社は新製品についての発表を近く行う。

definition_en: Suitable for any time; not associated with any particular time.
example: You can visit me anytime. / 私に何時でも来て下さい。

definition_en: Plainly; clearly; manifestly; evidently.
example: He's apparently very happy with his new job. / 彼は新しい仕事に対して明らかに満足している。

definition_en: To be grateful or thankful for.
example: She is appreciated for her hard work. / 彼女は彼女の努力を評価されている。

definition_en: A fact or statement used to support a proposition; a reason.
example: The debate was based on arguments about taxation. / 税金についての論争に基づいての議論だった。

definition_en: Man-made; of artifice.
meanings_ja: 偽りの、虚偽の (in a pejorative sense)
example: The artificial intelligence system was designed to mimic human conversation. / 人造の知能システムは人間の会話を模倣するように設計されました。
The festival celebrates the rich cultural heritage of Asia. / アジアの文化的遺産を祝うフェスティバル。

definition_en: An incidental remark made quietly so as to be heard by the person to whom it is said and not by any others in the vicinity.
example: I'll put this aside for now, so we can focus on the main task. / これを今は置いておくから、主要の仕事に集中できる。

definition_en: Any specific feature, part, or element of something.
example: The company's financial aspect is a concern. / その会社の財務的観点が問題です。

definition_en: The act of assigning; the allocation of a job or a set of tasks.
example: The teacher gave us several assignments to complete by the end of the semester. / テACHERは学期末まで複数の作業を割り当てました。

definition_en: A member of the crew of a spaceship or other spacecraft that travels beyond Earth's atmosphere, or someone trained to serve that purpose.
meanings_ja: 宇宙旅行者 (other possible meanings include "cosmonaut" or "space traveler", but these are less common)
example: The astronaut walked on the moon. / 宇宙飛行士は月面を歩いた。

definition_en: To pull toward without touching.
example: The company's new product will attract many customers. / その新製品は多くの顧客を引き付けます。

definition_en: A group of people within hearing; specifically, a large gathering of people listening to or watching a performance, speech, etc.
example: The play was a huge success with its targeted audience. / プレイは対象の聴衆に大成功した。

definition_en: Awe-inspiring, majestic, noble, venerable.
meanings_ja: 夏の終わり (referring to the month of August)
example: The new employee was an august addition to our team. / 我々チームに優秀な新入社員が加わった。

definition_en: A type of vehicle designed to move on the ground under its own stored power and intended to carry a driver, a small number of additional passengers, and a very limited amount of other load. A car or motorcar.
example: I'm going to buy an automobile. / 私は自動車を買うつもりです。

definition_en: The arithmetic mean.
meanings_ja:
I'd be happy to help! 😊

**Meaning 1:** 中央値 (chūō-chi)

**Meaning 2 (optional):** 平均点 (heikin-ten), 通常値 (tsūjou-chi)

**Example:**
English: The average score of the students is 80.
Japanese: 学生たちの平均スコアは80です。

Note: The main meaning of "average" is indeed "中央値" (central value), which refers to a typical or representative value in a set of data. If you'd like, I can also provide additional meanings, such as the arithmetic mean or average value, which might be referred to as 平均点 (heikin-ten) or 通常値 (tsūjou-chi).

definition_en: Short for awesomeness: the quality, state, or essence of being awesome.
example: This roller coaster is awesome! / これらのローラーコースターはすばらしい!

definition_en: To go in the reverse direction.
example: The company backed our proposal. / その企業は我們の提案を支持した。

definition_en: A state in which opposing forces harmonise; equilibrium.
example: The company needs to balance its budget. / その会社は預算を調整する必要がある。

definition_en: To deal with a bank or financial institution, or for an institution to provide financial services to a client.
example: The bank is conducting online banking. / その銀行はインターネットバンキングを実施しています。

definition_en: To summon; to call out.
example: The movie was banned in several countries. / いくつかの国で映画が禁止された。

definition_en: Something from which other things extend; a foundation.
meanings_ja: 基盤 (kihankan) - foundation or starting point
底 (beto) - lowest part or foundation of something
根拠 (konjou) - reason or justification for something
example: The company's base is its strong financial foundation. / その会社の基盤は強い財務。

definition_en: In a fundamental, essential or basic manner
example: I'm basically a morning person. / 私は基本的には朝人。

definition_en: A physical base or foundation.
meanings_ja: 根拠 (for scientific or theoretical basis)
example: The new policy was built on a solid basis. / 新しいポリシーは堅実な基礎に築かれた。

definition_en: A device used to power electric devices, consisting of a set of electrically connected electrochemical or, archaically, electrostatic cells. A single such cell when used by itself.
example: The new phone uses four AA batteries. / 新しい電話は四個AAの電池を使用します。

definition_en: An advantage; help or aid from something.
example: The company will benefit from the new marketing strategy. / 会社は新しいマーケティング戦略から有利な効果を得る。

definition_en: To cause (something) to change its shape into a curve, by physical force, chemical action, or any other means.
meanings_ja: ねじ曲げられた (in a physical sense)
example: The road was bent around the mountain. / 山を迂回して書き変わっていた道

definition_en: Also; in addition.
example: I like reading books besides studying. / 私は読書を好きです。また勉強している。

definition_en: The unknown.
example: The new technology goes beyond what we thought was possible. / 新技術は我々が考えていた以上のことができた。

definition_en: (modern British & Australian, short scale) a thousand million (logic: 1,000 × 1,000^2): 1 followed by nine zeros, 109; a milliard
meanings_ja: 百万 (in some contexts, such as business or finance)
example: The company's revenue reached a billion dollars last year. / その会社の収入は昨年億ドルの売り上げに達した。

definition_en: (modern British & Australian, short scale) a thousand million (logic: 1,000 × 1,000^2): 1 followed by nine zeros, 109; a milliard
example: The company's profits were in the billions. / その企業の利益は数十億あります。

definition_en: Any of various bladed or pointed hand weapons, originally designating an Anglo-Saxon sword, and later a weapon of infantry, especially in the 14th and 15th centuries, commonly consisting of a broad, heavy, double-edged, hook-shaped blade, with a short pike at the back and another at the top, attached to the end of a long staff.
example: The hotel sent me a bill for the damages. / ホテルは、damagesの賠償のための請求書を送りました。

definition_en: To produce an air current.
example: The wind was blowing strongly, so I had to hold my hat tightly. / 風は強く吹いており、帽子をしっかりと持つ必要があった。

definition_en: A bobbing motion; a quick up and down movement.
example: I got a haircut, so I'm sporting a new bob. / 私は髪を切ったので、新しい髪型で出ました。

definition_en: To receive (something) from somebody temporarily, expecting to return it.
meanings_ja: 複製、盗用 (in a negative sense, implying copying or stealing without permission)
example: The artist was accused of borrowing ideas from another famous painter. / そのアーティストは別の有名な画家から貸し出したと疑われた。

definition_en: The woody part of a tree arising from the trunk and usually dividing.
example: The company has a branch in Tokyo. / 東京に支店があります。

definition_en: To separate into two or more pieces, to fracture or crack, by a process that cannot easily be reversed for reassembly.
example: The company's financial situation is breaking. / その会社の財務状況は崩壊している。

definition_en: A hardened rectangular block of mud, clay etc., used for building.
example: The new building is made of bricks. / 新しいビルは建材でできている。

definition_en: (manner) In a brief manner, summarily.
example: I'll explain briefly why this project failed. / これらのプロジェクトの失敗の理由を短く説明します。

definition_en: A person or animal who browses.
meanings_ja: ソフトウェアの種類（検索や閲覧を行う）
example: I'm using Google Chrome as my browser to search for information online. / 私はGoogle Chromeを使用してオンラインで情報を探しています。

definition_en: The amount of money or resources earmarked for a particular institution, activity or time-frame.
example: The company needs to create a budget for next year. / 今年のために会社は財務計画を作らなければならない。

definition_en: A projectile, usually of metal, shot from a gun at high speed.
example: The bullet hit the target. / 銃弾が標的に命中した。

definition_en: A group of similar things, either growing together, or in a cluster or clump, usually fastened together.
example: I picked a bunch of flowers in the garden. / わたしは園内で小さな花束を摘みました。

definition_en: A specific commercial enterprise or establishment.
meanings_ja: 企業 (mainly referring to companies or organizations)
example: Many small businesses are struggling to stay afloat. / 多くの小さな企業が存続するために大きな努力を費やしている。
James Cameron, a famous film director. / ジェームズ・キャメロン、有名な映画監督。

definition_en: A series of operations undertaken to achieve a set goal.
example: The company is launching a new product campaign. / その会社は新製品の政治運動を始める。

definition_en: A disease in which the cells of a tissue undergo uncontrolled (and often rapid) proliferation.
meanings_ja: 腫瘍 (this is a more general term that can refer to various types of cancer)
example: The doctor said I have cancer, so I need to get surgery. / がんだと言われたので、手術する必要があると医師は言った。

definition_en: A person who is running in an election.
example: The company will interview several candidates today. / その会社は今日、多くの候補者を面接します。

definition_en: A person who is running in an election.
meanings_ja: 予選候補者 (in academic or professional contexts)
example: The company is interviewing many candidates for the open position. / その会社はopenポジションの多くの選考者にインタビューを実施しています。

definition_en: A close-fitting hat, either brimless or peaked.
example: The company provides caps to its employees. / 会社は従業員にヘルメットを提供します。

definition_en: Grief, sorrow.
example: She takes good cares of her children. / 彼女は子供たちのために良く世話をしている。

definition_en: (heading) To capture, overtake.
meanings_ja: ついてくる (for something that is moving or being pursued)
example: The ball was catching fire, so we had to put it out. / ボールが燃え始めたので消火しなければならなかった。

definition_en: To line or finish (a surface, such as a wall), with plaster, stucco, thin boards, or similar.
meanings_ja: 最高限度 (in a figurative sense)
